product: The Jackbox Party Pack 3
Name: Anish Anurag
Title: Your Reliable Power Source on the Go
Description: The MI Power Bank 3i with a massive capacity of 20000mAh has proven to be a game-changer in my daily life. This portable powerhouse has become my go-to solution for keeping all my devices charged and ready to go, earning it a well-deserved five-star review.Pros:1. Huge CapacityWith its impressive 20000mAh capacity, this power bank offers abundant energy to charge my devices multiple times. Whether it's my smartphone, tablet, or even my wireless earbuds, the MI Power Bank 3i has more than enough juice to keep them running throughout the day.2. Fast Charging TechnologyThe built-in fast charging technology is a standout feature of this power bank. It efficiently charges my devices in no time, saving me valuable minutes and ensuring I stay connected and productive even during busy days.3. Dual USB PortsI love the convenience of having dual USB ports. It allows me to charge two devices simultaneously without any compromise in charging speed. It's perfect for keeping both my phone and tablet powered up during travel or while working on the go.4. Sturdy Build QualityThe MI Power Bank 3i boasts a sturdy and durable build quality. Its sleek metal casing not only looks elegant but also offers excellent protection against accidental drops or bumps, giving me peace of mind when carrying it in my bag.5. LED Battery IndicatorThe LED battery indicator is a practical addition that lets me check the power bank's remaining charge at a glance. This feature comes in handy, ensuring that I never run out of power unexpectedly.Cons:1. Slightly HeavyGiven its high capacity, the power bank is slightly heavier than smaller models. However, the extra weight is a minor trade-off for the extensive charging capabilities it provides.Conclusion:In conclusion, the MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh is an outstanding power source that I can always rely on. Its huge capacity, fast charging technology, and dual USB ports make it an essential companion for my busy and tech-dependent lifestyle.The sturdy build quality and LED battery indicator are thoughtful touches that add to its overall convenience and user experience. While it may be slightly heavier, the reliable and efficient performance of this power bank more than compensates for it.For its exceptional capabilities and reliable performance, I wholeheartedly give the MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh a glowing five-star rating. Embrace the convenience and power it offers, and never worry about running out of battery again. This power bank is undoubtedly a worthy investment for anyone seeking a reliable and high-capacity charging solution on the go.

product: The Jackbox Party Pack 3
Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Detailed Review - Must Read
Description: When I bought this Powerbank, I didn't found a detailed review regarding this but now as I have used and tested this Powerbank (20000 mAh variant) for 7 days, so I think I'm eligible to write a detailed review for this. Mainly I will write this review based on 4 points, build quality, charging time of powerbank, charging speed and battery backup. So let's start.1. Build Quality : The build quality of this Powerbank feels quite solid & nice. Its sandstone design texture and round edges makes its grip solid in hands & quite comfortable to hold. Before this I used to have Redmi Powerbank (20000 mAh) which in comparison to this Mi Powerbank feels little ugly in terms of design and uncomfortable to hold. Mi Powerbank feels less wider, thinner & more premium as compared to the previous one.2. Charging Time of Powerbank : The day I received this Powerbank, its LED indicators showed 2 LEDs blinking which means it had battery level between 25% to 50%. So before using it for the first time, I charged it fully using my standard 10W charger.One should also note that charging time of Powerbank along with the adapter also depends on what type of cable you are using. Using an old type C cable will take more time to charge it, as current carrying capacity of the cable decreases with time due to frequent usage. Although my 10W adapter is quite old but I have a new type C cable which supports fast charging, so I charged my powerbank with this setup and it took around 8 hours to charge it fully. So you can expect to charge it from 0 to 100% in around 11-12 hours using a 10W charger. Whereas if you use a fast charger like 33 Watt, 65 Watt etc. then ofcourse the powerbank will charge at a faster rate but it will also affect the efficiency and thermals of the powerbank in a negative way in the long run, so keep that in mind.3. Charging Speed Test : I tested the charging speed provided by this powerbank using 3 different type C cables to charge my 4000 mAh mobile device. Each time I charged my device to 80% using different cables (in second case I forgot to check & it got charged up to 90%) and noted the overall time it took to charge the device. All the results are attached in order as screenshots for reference.In first case, I charged it with my 2 yr old type C cable which although supports fast charging but the results were not impressive. (Time 1h 43 min Pic)In second case, I charged it with a new type C cable which came with my tws earbuds but it does not supports fast charging and the results were relatively better as compared to the first case. (Time 1h 58min Pic)In third case, I charged it with the type C cable which comes inside the box of this powerbank and supports fast charging, and in this case I got the most impressive results. The device got charged to 50% in just 30 min, and 80% in 1h 8min. (Time 1h 8min Pic)So, it shows that the cable also plays a very important role in fast charging your device which many people ignore.4. Battery Backup : Other than the above mentioned test results I charged my mobile 3 more times but didn't noted the charging time. So all in all, till now I have charged my device to a total of 406% in 6 different rounds (80% + 94% + 80% + 44% + 82% + 31%) and still 3 LED lights of powerbank are blinking which literally amazed me considering the negative reviews I read about its battery backup before buying it.So, overall I would say you can buy this powerbank if it suits your requirements and budget. Also if you buy this powerbank then I would suggest you to charge it fully before using it for the first time and test other things during that 7 days replacement period, so if you find any issues with it, you would be able to replace it. I used AccuBattery app to record the battery percentage & time it took to charge my phone.P.S : Will update the review in future if felt the need to do it.

Title: All about this product

product: The Jackbox Party Pack 3

Title: Output is NOT c type

The type b cable is honestly so archaic now when most phones are going type cI bought it for it's speed but doesn't deliver on that.

product: The Jackbox Party Pack 3
Name: nk nitzs
Title: Good one from MI
Description: I have previously used 20000mah from MI the first one ever released and that‚Äôs working till now. As my brother is using it, so, I decided to get another one for me. So, which brand to go for? Well why not the same one I‚Äôve been using. So, I decided to opt for this. The power-bank comes in a simple packaging with a scratch code on top to verify the product‚Äôs authenticity and ghat if it‚Äôs been used previously l. Mine was a new one with all the things intact. In the box you get a power-bank 20000mah and a usb type to type-C cable that is quite short, don‚Äôt expect much.The main highlight is the power-bank which has 2-USB type A, 1 USB type C and 1 micro USB type. Micro USB only supports input while USB C can be used for input as well as output. The type A can only be used for output. The max output is 18W and supports fast charging.1. Build Quality (4.5/5): Aluminium body looks sturdy and durable.2. Charging Time of Power-bank (4/5): Around 7 hours from 25watt charger I used. Although I think 18W is the max input it supports.3. Charging Output (4/5): Max 18W fast charging and yes it can charge iPhone and Samsung phones if you are worried. No issues there as I have tried it on my devices. The output may decrease if you charge multiple devices simultaneously.4. Packaging and condition (5/5): Received a brand new product in working condition and a genuine one in a good packaging. So, KUDOS to that!# You can simultaneously charge the  power-bank while charging the devices. But,  there might be an issue if you charge two  devices that supports super fast charging  like when I tried to charge my tab s9 and my  phone S23-FE simultaneously when the  power-bank was in charging, my S23-FE  stopped charging after a few seconds.  Although, when I tried it while connecting  tab and iPhones it was working without any  issues. And yes, this is only during the  charging devices while charging the  power-bank at the same time.# 3 output ports (2 type A and one  type C)and 2 input ports (micro USB and  type C).# 12 layer protection against short circuit.Imp to notice:1. For charging low power devices like watch and earpods, you can switch to low power output mode by fast clicking the power button twice and holding it until the light start blinking one by one. That is low power output mode and it‚Äôs a really nice addition.Just click the power button once to switch back to normal mode.2. Can switch off the power-bank too, now, that‚Äôs something to watch even though I don‚Äôt know how long am I gonna use it. Just tap and hold power button once for 10seconds and then you will see the all the lights blink at the same time for 10 times and then it‚Äôs off.So, overall for me as I have previously used the Mi power bank, I hope this one lasts as well.I grabbed it at ‚Çπ1899 in great Indian festival. But, I have seen price come down to ‚Çπ1699 after I had bought it. So, keep an eye for the offer for the lower price.Overall a good buy: 4.5/5

product: Close Apps, Stop Running Apps | Background Apps List: Made for Fire TV and Fire Tablets
Name: SM
Title: Love the phone but missing couple of basic feature options
Description: For the price of 8999 this is truly an amazing phone in terms of performance, smoothness weight and comfortability to use. I exchanged this with a Redmi 9A and compared to that this device is 100 times better.The camera is amazing, battery backup is fantastic and charging is super fast. There are no lags when switching apps and there are many useful features which are seen in Moto phones that I could find on this device.Having said that I was surprised to find some basic features missing or complicated compared to Samsung or Redmi phones.- There is no option to Hide Apps. No App Lock or any such option to hide the many apps which you may not use. The UI version is T edition and that is not even mentioned on the website. The previous UI versions and the option to enable Hide Apps or Lock Apps is listed on Realme website. I use the feature of Hide Apps on all my phones and so it was a disappointment here. Call to customer care did not get a confirmation if that will be available in future updates.- There is no option to create folder or group icons together. In all my other phones I have this option and even on the cheaper that Realme ones. For example all your UPI apps will be mixed up all over the app drawer and cannot be grouped under a single folder in this device. Again a disappointment for me and as before no confirmation from customer care about future update.- Call recording options- In what seems to be a bizzare setting, the recording is split into two - one to record all calls from numbers not in your contact list and the other for Selected numbers which would require you to start adding all your contacts one by one painfully. There is no simple option to record all calls. For someone with maybe 200 or more contacts it is a hard day's work. You have to click Choose contact and from the next screen of all listed contacts, select a contact which takes you back to the previous screen. You have to again click Choose contact to select your next contact. Very tiring and cumbersome and I am not sure why Realme had to complicate this simple option into something so confounding. Real disappointment for me there.Keeping these three issues aside, I loved this phone every bit. I have to say that this device at 8999 outperforms my 15000 Samsung in every aspect.I only hope they will take care of the missing or convoluted basic feature issues that I mentioned before to make this phone a true super hero!.

product: Close Apps, Stop Running Apps | Background Apps List: Made for Fire TV and Fire Tablets
Name: Rohan Kumar Mishra
Title: Honest review and pros and cons
Description: Here is my honest review of the realme narzo N53 smartphone:Pros:Fast charging - The 33W fast charging allows the phone's 5,000 mAh battery to charge very quickly. realme claims it can charge to 50% in just 28 minutes.Slim design - At 7.99mm thick, realme says this is the slimmest phone in its price segment. The featherweight design makes it comfortable to hold.90Hz display - The 6.6" FHD+ display has a 90Hz refresh rate for smooth scrolling and transitions. Good for gaming and multimedia.Decent hardware - It has a MediaTek Helio G85 processor, up to 6GB RAM and 128GB storage which is decent hardware for the price. Gaming performance should be smooth.Cons:Average camera - The 50MP main camera is decent but night photography and low light shots may not be great. Lacks high-end camera features like OIS.Older software - Ships with Android 11, not the latest Android 12. Support for software updates is unclear.Plastic build - The featherlight design is thanks to a plastic body rather than glass or metal. It doesn't feel very premium.Overall, the narzo N53 offers good fast charging, a slim and light design, smooth 90Hz display and decent performance for the price. But the cameras, software and build quality could be better. For budget smartphone buyers who prioritize fast charging and design, it's worth considering. But those wanting the best camera or software may want to look at other options.

It lasts a good amount of time without taking up too much space in my pantry. * Value for Money: I find Tata Salt to be very affordable, especially considering its quality and freshness.Overall, I highly recommend Tata Salt, 1kg, to anyone looking for a reliable, flavorful, and healthy salt option. Name: Amit
Title: The Essence of Authentic Flavor
Description: Fortune Premium Kachi Ghani Pure Mustard Oil, packed in a 1L PET bottle, offers the authentic taste and aroma of mustard oil to elevate your culinary creations. As an enthusiast of traditional flavors, I recently had the pleasure of trying Fortune Premium Kachi Ghani Pure Mustard Oil, and it has proven to be a reliable choice for those seeking the genuine essence of mustard oil in their cooking.One of the standout features of Fortune Premium Kachi Ghani Pure Mustard Oil is its extraction process. Made using the traditional "Kachi Ghani" method, this oil retains the natural pungency and distinct flavor that is characteristic of mustard oil. The seeds are cold-pressed to ensure the preservation of the oil's authentic taste and nutritional properties.The rich and robust flavor of Fortune Premium Kachi Ghani Pure Mustard Oil enhances the taste of various dishes. It adds a unique depth and sharpness to curries, stir-fries, marinades, and pickles, bringing out the true essence of traditional Indian cuisine. The oil's distinct aroma creates a sensory experience that transports you to a world of authentic flavors.Fortune Premium Kachi Ghani Pure Mustard Oil is known for its various health benefits. It contains essential fatty acids, vitamins, and antioxidants that contribute to overall well-being. Mustard oil is believed to have anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties, making it a popular choice in Ayurvedic practices. It is important to note that individual dietary considerations and moderation should be taken into account when incorporating mustard oil into your diet.

I recently had the opportunity to try out this product and I have to say, I'm very impressed.One of the things that stood out to me about this product is its superior quality. The wheat grains used to make this atta are carefully selected from the finest wheat fields in the country. This means that the flour has a high protein content, which makes it ideal for making soft and fluffy rotis that stay fresh for longer.Another thing that I really liked about Aashirvaad Select Sharbati Atta is its versatility. This atta can be used to make a wide range of Indian breads, including chapatis, parathas, puris, and naans. I found that the dough was easy to work with and the breads came out perfectly every time.In terms of taste, I found that the rotis made with this atta had a delicious, nutty flavor that was very satisfying. They were also very filling and kept me feeling full for longer periods of time.Overall, I would highly recommend Aashirvaad Select Sharbati Atta to anyone who is looking for a high-quality, versatile, and delicious whole wheat flour. It's definitely worth the investment and I'm sure you won't be disappointed!

product: Himalaya Baby Cream, Face Moisturizer & Day Cream, For Dry Skin 200ml
Name: Naresh
Title: A Refreshing Twist on Traditional Desi Kahwa
Description: Girnar's Detox Green Tea, with its Desi Kahwa flavor, is a delightful and invigorating twist on a classic recipe. As a green tea enthusiast, I was eager to try this product, and I've been pleasantly surprised by the results.First and foremost, the convenience of having 100 tea bags in a single package is a boon for daily tea drinkers like me. The 250-gram quantity ensures that I have a good supply to last for a while, and each tea bag is individually wrapped for freshness.The aroma that wafts from each tea bag is inviting, with hints of cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves, which are the hallmark of a traditional Desi Kahwa. The blend is beautifully balanced, and the quality of the ingredients is evident.I find this green tea to be an excellent choice for a morning or mid-afternoon pick-me-up. It provides a refreshing and soothing experience, especially when you need a break from the usual black tea or coffee. The added bonus of green tea's antioxidants makes it even better for your health.The taste is where this Detox Green Tea truly shines. It's a harmonious fusion of green tea's inherent earthy notes and the warming spices of Desi Kahwa. It's neither too overpowering nor too subtle; it strikes a perfect balance that keeps me coming back for more. It's not only a tasty beverage but also aids in digestion and overall well-being.The tea bags steep easily and quickly, and the result is a delightful cup of tea that is both comforting and revitalizing. It's great to sip on its own or pair with a light snack.In conclusion, Girnar's Detox Green Tea (Desi Kahwa) is a wonderful addition to my tea collection. The quality, taste, and convenience of this product are impressive. If you're looking for a delicious and healthy tea option that combines the benefits of green tea with the flavors of Desi Kahwa, I highly recommend giving this one a try.Feel free to personalize this review with any specific experiences or details you'd like to include.

Name: Rupesh Pal Singh
Title: Dependable and Durable Garbage Bags for All Your Needs!
Description: I recently purchased a pack of garbage bags online, and I must say I am quite impressed with their performance. These garbage bags have proven to be reliable, durable, and convenient for all my household waste management needs. Here's my detailed review based on my experience:Durability:The first thing that caught my attention was the exceptional durability of these garbage bags. Made from high-quality materials, they are designed to withstand the weight and sharp edges of various types of trash. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the bags rarely tore or leaked, even when filled to their maximum capacity. This feature alone makes them stand out among other brands I've used in the past.Capacity:The bags come in a generous size, providing ample room for disposing of a significant amount of waste. I found them to be ideal for both kitchen and general household trash. Whether it was disposing of food scraps, packaging materials, or even larger items, these bags managed to handle it all. The capacity of the bags reduced the frequency of bag changes, which is a time and cost-saving advantage.Ease of Use:The garbage bags are designed with convenience in mind. They are easy to open, and the drawstring closure system makes tying and sealing them a breeze. I particularly appreciate the drawstring feature as it helps to secure the contents and prevents any unpleasant odors from escaping. This simple yet effective design makes disposal quick and hassle-free.Odor Control:One of the most important aspects of any garbage bag is its ability to control odors. I'm glad to report that these bags do an excellent job in this regard. The bags have an added scent neutralizer, which effectively minimizes unpleasant smells and keeps the surrounding area fresh. This feature is particularly beneficial, especially when disposing of kitchen waste.Value for Money:Considering the quality and performance of these garbage bags, I find them to be reasonably priced. The pack I purchased contained an ample quantity of bags, which ensured that I won't run out of them anytime soon. The durability and versatility of these bags make them a cost-effective option, as they require fewer replacements compared to inferior alternatives.Overall, I am highly satisfied with my purchase of these garbage bags. They have proven to be a reliable waste management solution, surpassing my expectations in terms of durability, capacity, ease of use, odor control, and value for money. While there may be a few minor improvements that could be made, such as adding more environmental-friendly options, I believe these bags are an excellent choice for everyday use. I would highly recommend them to anyone in need of sturdy and reliable garbage bags.Note: It's always important to consider and promote environmentally friendly alternatives to single-use plastic products whenever possible, such as compostable or biodegradable bags, as they contribute to reducing plastic waste.

Title: Ultimate Protection and Comfort
Description: I am delighted to share my experience with the Wakefit Cotton Feel Terry Ultra Soft Waterproof Mattress Protector, a product that has truly transformed my sleeping experience for the better. This mattress protector has managed to combine exceptional waterproofing capabilities with a level of comfort that feels like a dream.From the moment I laid the Wakefit Mattress Protector on my bed, I was impressed by the luxurious feel of the fabric. The ultra-soft terry cotton material is not only gentle against the skin but also adds an extra layer of comfort to the mattress. Its cozy texture enhances the overall sleeping experience, ensuring that I drift into a peaceful slumber every night.The standout feature of this mattress protector, undoubtedly, is its impeccable waterproofing. It's remarkable how effectively it guards against spills, stains, and moisture, all while maintaining its soft touch. The waterproof layer beneath the surface doesn't compromise on comfort, which sets this protector apart from others in the market.I particularly appreciate the precision with which the protector fits onto the mattress. The elasticized corners ensure a secure and snug fit, preventing any slipping or bunching during the night. This attention to detail speaks volumes about the thought and care that Wakefit has put into designing a product that not only functions flawlessly but also adds aesthetic value to the bed.What truly surprised me is how well the mattress protector has maintained its quality even after several washes. The durability of the fabric and the waterproof layer is a testament to the high-quality materials used in its construction. It's clear that Wakefit prioritizes longevity and performance, ensuring that the investment in this mattress protector is well worth it.In terms of value for money, the Wakefit Cotton Feel Terry Ultra Soft Waterproof Mattress Protector is an absolute winner. It not only extends the lifespan of the mattress but also elevates the sleeping experience to a level of unparalleled comfort. The ease of maintenance and the peace of mind that comes with knowing my mattress is well-protected make this purchase incredibly worthwhile.

product: Safari Pentagon Hardside Medium Size Check-in Luggage Suitcase Trolley Bags for Travel Black Color 66cm
Name: Kushal
Title: Beware of BLDC fans. Please, please do yourself a favour and do not buy them.
Description: I bought "Atomberg Efficio 1200mm BLDC Motor 5 Star Rated Ceiling Fan with Remote Control and 2+1 warranty" on 16th July and the product got delivered on 20th July. Got it installed (easy part) from a local electrician and made sure that the fan is not connected to the fan regulator. Few days later fan stopped working. Called Atomberg support and they promised help in 24-48 hours with a warning to charge Rs. 250 if the fan is found connected to regulator. Until 2 days later no one showed up. Had to call again several times and then someone showed up after 5 days and repaired it. In the meantime, I enquired from the local electrician who had installed the fan and he said that since it was a BLDC fan he cannot help repair it. When I enquired from Atomberg technician why new fan suddenly stopped working, I was told that it is a machine some part might have gone bad....I have replaced it and now it will work fine.After few weeks fan stopped working again. This time technician said there is something wrong with this piece and got the fan replaced. Couple of months later fan stopped working again and this time technician had to replace the PCB of the fan. In the last 6 months with this fan, fan has stopped working 4 times and it has taken more than 5-6 calls (nightmare) each time on an average to get some Atomberg techician to repair it. I even got to know that Atomberg Efficio and Renesa are their top models but still there are lot of issues with them.PROS1. Comes with 2+1 year warranty. Additional 1 year is given only when the customer gets the fan registered within a stipulated time frame.2. 5 star rated, therefore less electricity bill as claimed by the company. I think I fell for this gimmick as my usage is close to 12-14 hours a day. But I didn't see any significant change in my electricity bill over the last 6 months of using it. Fans do not consume lot of electricity compared to ACs, geysers etc therefore one shud never buy a fan with the intention of saving electricity (something learnt here)CONS1. BLDC technology is pretty new. Therefore not stable yet.2. Lot of issues in the last 6 months. Very difficult to sleep at night with fan not working and technician taking 5-6 days to arrive.3. Local electricians cannot repair them as the replacement parts are only available through Atomberg. So you are stuck here and at the mercy of Atomberg.4. Lot of time wasted with customer support calls5. Comes with a remote which is very easy to misplace.  If remote gets lost or stops working one cannot change fan speed. Getting a replacement remote is time consuming and generic remotes are not supported yet. They are coming up with app based remotes. Again, not a big fan of putting too much technology in a simple thing like fan.6. Regulator is not supported atleast with my Efficio model. Not sure if they will come up with something in the future. It is always good to have regulator to control fan speed.7. Customer will have to replace the fan after the warranty gets over. Replacement parts/repairs are very costly. PCB part which went bad within 4-5 months of purchase costs 50% of the price of the fan. Imagine if it were to go bad after warranty period. By buying newer company fans which can be serviced only by the company technician customer gets tied to the ecosystem of the company and becomes a constant subscriber to the related costs. Overcomplication of simple things like fan in the name of technology is a nightmare which I would prefer to avoid in future purchases after learning from this episode.8. Atomberg service is slow and unreliable. Unless you really get behind them do not expect any timely delivery of promised service.SummaryOld is gold. Stick with old technology fans yet which work flawlessly for years and can be repaired by any local technician. Cost savings with newer technology based fans is not substantial enough to invite the hassles which come along with it.

Title: Cooling Comfort Redefined
Description: The Orient Electric Apex-FX Ceiling Fan is a true game-changer in the realm of cooling appliances. As someone who values both functionality and aesthetics, this fan has exceeded my expectations on all fronts.First and foremost, let's talk about performance. The Apex-FX fan is a powerhouse when it comes to delivering a cool breeze. Equipped with a high-speed motor, it effectively circulates air throughout the room, providing instant relief from the sweltering heat. Even on the hottest days, I can count on this fan to keep me comfortable and refreshed.What sets the Orient Electric Apex-FX apart is its silent operation. Unlike traditional ceiling fans that produce distracting noise, this fan operates almost silently, allowing me to enjoy a peaceful environment without any disturbances. Whether I'm working, sleeping, or simply relaxing, the quiet performance of this fan never fails to impress.In addition to its exceptional performance, the Orient Electric Apex-FX boasts a sleek and modern design that effortlessly complements any interior decor. The aerodynamically designed blades not only enhance airflow but also add a touch of elegance to my living space. It's the perfect blend of form and function, making it a stylish addition to any room.If you're in the market for a ceiling fan that combines superior performance, silent operation, and stylish design, look no further than the Orient Electric Apex-FX. Whether you're battling the summer heat or simply seeking comfort year-round, this fan is guaranteed to exceed your expectations. Invest in the Apex-FX and experience cooling comfort like never before!

It's a must-have of you're travelling to UK, else you won't be able to charge your devices.Important: It's not a voltage converter, it's just a socket adapter. And you won't need to convert voltage and frequency since power lines in UK, Europe, Australia, Arab countries and India operate at the same voltage and frequency (220V, 50Hz).

product: American Tourister Fizz 32L Black Backpack School bag for travel with Organizer Bottle compartment water resistant backpack for Men, Women, Boys Laptop Backpack for College Gift for Men & Women
Name: Godwintgn
Title: Title: Good Choice for Multiple Devices, But Some Minor Issues
Description: I recently purchased this charger, and it has some great features. If you have multiple devices, it's a good choice. The PD port works fine, and the build quality is excellent. In a world where mobiles no longer come with chargers, this is a fantastic option for both regular users and travelers.However, there are a couple of downsides. The Euro port feels fragile due to the length of the plug and the charger's weight. Also, the mechanism that should make the plugs retract inside the charger when you press the side button doesn't work as smoothly as expected. You need to press it slightly for them to go inside.Apart from these minor issues, it's a great product. The only other drawback is the price, which feels a bit too high.

Name: Ekta Purswani
Title: Easy to use with durable, light weight rod
Description: Strengths or pros of the product1) The look of the product is great although it is just available in single color/design.2)The bucket is lightweight, without partitions, and made of good-quality plastic. The drain hole in the bucket makes it easy to clean.3) The rod is lightweight but durable. It is comparable to Scotch-Brite Spin Mop.4) The extendable handle is useful to pull the bucket but is not very strong.But there are some downsides to the product.1)  If one just mops the accidental spillage and replaces the mop without draining the bucket, the dirt settles at the bottom. It is difficult to clean as the spinner of the bucket is not removable.2) A single bucket without partitioning of the clean and dirty water makes all the water dirty and one has to refill the clean water repeatedly.3) The wheel of the product is just on one side and it is not super easy to move when filled.4) The small bottle given for filling the cleaning solution falls off easily while taking out the spin mop.

product: WildHorn Leather Wallet for Men I Ultra Strong Stitching I 6 Credit Card Slots I 2 Currency Compartments I 1 Coin Pocket
Name: Placeholder
Title: Reject material
Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                



I am from the Interiors industry, and tried this EzyCR8 material out last September. For academic purpose,  I did the joint sealing of my own bathroom floor myself, as the toilet needed the treatment.The material is a big fail as I observed, and now I need to call for a professional to do the job within 6 months of my sealing the joints.The tube is awkward shaped and too hard to press to get a uniform application, and is not a DIY job as it took me 5 hours of pressing the tube to get my 50 Sq.ft bathroom done.They should have thought of giving it in a easier to use silicon gun type  dispenser so the DIY effort is more accurate, and less wasteful.  The current tube design wastes about 15% of the paste, that cannot be wrung like a toothpaste tube to get all there is in it. It took me 1.5 tubes to do my 50 Sq. Ft toilet with 1'x1' tiles.The tube doesn't come with tools to flute or surface flush the paste with the tile surface, and dries faster than the time it takes to press it into the tile joints.The big fail is it doesn't stay dry on coming in contact with water. I pressed the paste flush with my tile surface, closed the water supply to my toilet to ensure no leakage disturbs the drying application, and went on holiday for 15 days (recommended time for drying is lesser than 3 days)  .15 days later  when I washed away the extra grit /burrs above the tiles, some of it immediately came off from inside the joints, and the rest became wet.Over the next three months, it has been regularly coming off - without any effort -from the joints that are 1- 3 mm thick( poor tiling job by someone 15 years ago) , and only the corner joints where I messily put about 5-6 mm thick paste stayed put. This too becomes wet whenever in contact with water.We do not use any acid in our bathroom and just have regular cleaning with harpic, so it should not get affected.Today, 6 months later, the material left in the tile joints has gone yellow despite regular cleaning, and I can see fungus on it in some corners.I conclude that it's a waste of time, effort , and money. I am paying someone three times more than what I spent on the two tube to redo it with proper chemical grout and have a hygienic and neat looking toilet.

Name: Abdul Hashmi
Title: Excellent tiles adhesive
Description: I recently used Asian Paints Tiles Sealant for my bathroom renovation project, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the results. From application to finish, this product exceeded my expectations. The application process was a breeze, thanks to its smooth consistency and easy-to-use nozzle. It adhered perfectly to the tiles, leaving no room for water seepage or mold growth, ensuring long-lasting protection for my bathroom walls. What impressed me the most was its quick drying time, allowing me to proceed with the next steps of my renovation without any delays.Moreover, the seamless finish it provided gave my bathroom a professional look, elevating the overall aesthetic appeal of the space. Its anti-fungal properties give me peace of mind knowing that my bathroom will stay clean and hygienic for years to come. I highly recommend Asian Paints Tiles Sealant to anyone looking for a reliable and high-quality solution for their tile sealing needs. It's definitely worth every penny for the peace of mind and durability it provides.

Title: Stylish and Versatile Hair Clips!
Description: I purchased these hair accessories for my niece, and overall, we're quite happy with the purchase. The set has various colourful hair clips, which my niece adores. The clips are well-made and seem durable. They're also easy to use, a big plus for a toddler like mine.The reason I'm giving this product 4 stars instead of 5 is that a few of the clips were a bit smaller than I expected, and I would have liked a few larger-sized clips. Additionally, the packaging could have been better; some of the clips arrived slightly tangled. However, the variety and quality of the clips make up for these minor issues.Ultimately, my niece looks adorable with these clips in her hair, and it's a fun way to accessorize. I'd recommend this set to other parents with little girls who love dressing up their hair."

product: Simple Kind To Skin Refreshing Facial Wash 150 ml | 100% Soap-Free Facewash that doesn't dry out your skin| For All Skin Types
Name: Swaroop Chinmay
Title: The ultimate book!
Description: i) Are you hurt? or did someone reject you? Or do you think you don't have enough maturity to maintain relationships? or do you just want to understand how relations work?ii) Do you wonder if there are any so-called 'natural laws' that we must follow in life for things to work better?iii) Are you really very busy that you cannot manage your time effectively? or do you want to know how to prioritise your activities?iv) Do you want to know the real meaning of  maturity, happiness, love, frustration etc...v) Do you somehow feel some emptiness in your life or in your relationship despite giving your best?vi) Do you want to know how to communicate with others in accordance with natural laws?vii) Do you want to know how to find out what exactly is your mission in life?viii) Do you want to know what is right or wrong in any given situation etc...And I can continue the list. No matter what ever may be your problem, I bet you'll find a solution in this book. Please trust me. I'm not exaggerating facts.‚ÜíThe book has a total of 7 habits:a) Private victory: These habits lift a person from dependent stage to independent stage.1. Be proactive:It basically teaches that "between stimulus and response HUMANS have the ability to choose". In computer metaphor it says you are the programmer.2. Begin with the end in mind:It teaches how to write a 'personal constitution' through which you can achieve your goals. In computer metaphor it says "write the program."3. Put first things first:It teaches how to prepare a scheduler/planner based on 'fourth generation of time management' which overcomes the shortcomings of the previous three generations. In computer metaphor it says "execute the program".b) Public victory: These habits lift a person from independent stage to interdependent stage.4. Think win/win:In teaches how 'win-win/no deal' is the only viable alternative in interdependent reality transactions.5. Seek first to understand and then to be understood:It teaches basic laws to be followed to have a meaningful conversation with others.6. Synergize:It basically teaches how one plus one is greater than two (it may be 10/20/100 depending on the trust level)7. Sharpen the saw:It teaches how to have a balanced self-renewal in all four dimensions of human life viz., physical, social/emotional, mental and spiritual.‚ÜíWhat's unique in this book:1. The concept of character ethic and personality ethic.2. The principles or laws are excellent. They are the foundation on which this book is written.3. A broad definition of success.4. Making us use our four 'unique human endowments' in solving our problems and even while reading this book.5. There is logic/reason in everything covey says.1. Covey says that he found startling contrast between the self help literature before 20th century and after 20th century. He found that the literature before 20th century concentrated more on the "character ethic" or the base (or the roots or the person's character or the private victory). In contrast the literature after 20th century concentrated more on the "personality ethic" or manipulation tricks (or public victory or communication skills or quick fixes or bandaids). Personality ethic may be required in some situations in life. But serving character through personality ethic is unacceptable. It doesn't really help. Just imagine trying to reach a destination in India using maps of America. It doesn't work. He says you may be a positive thinker and think positively like "Well we are going to reach the correct destination. Be positive". Even then you don't reach the destination because obviously the MAPS are incorrect. But as you are a positive thinker, even if you don't reach your destination, you may feel "Ok. Let me think positively that whatever god does or whatever happens to me is for my benefit only".  But the problem with that type of thinking is that ultimately YOU DON'T REACH YOUR DESTINATION.2. There are, what covey calls, natural laws or principles that govern us. We have to live in accordance with them.Example:Law- when you love anyone don't put any conditions for that love.Exp- When you love someone unconditionally you encourage their natural growth process and give them strength. If you attach conditions to that love, the other person wants to prove that he matters as a person independent of you. You put him in a reactive state.3. Covey stresses that  success in one area doesn't mean success in other areas too, as we live in an interdependent reality. If success in one area is enough, you'd probably isolate yourself from the society and work on it. Can your high profile/salary job do something to your broken relationship in your marriage? He further gives what success really is.4. Human beings posses four unique human endowments viz., self awareness, imagination, conscience and independent will, which makes us truly unique. Even the most intelligent animals possess none of these.Covey says you should strive for P/PC balance. The person producing results is called production(P) and the ability of that person to produce results is called production capability (PC). If you concentrate more on P, you will get sick and be unfit for PC. On the other hand if you concentrate too much on PC, you will get no work done.5. This book is not something which tells you that "do this and suddenly a light will shine upon you and take you into... or do good, be good, let's spread joy...Or do this and something miracle happens and save you bla bla...". When Covey says something he means it. He follows it throughout the book.example 1: When your son doesn't agree with what you said, you get him into your way of thinking through threatening or exploiting his vulnerabilities because you are smarter, stronger and (you think) you are RIGHT. You will win. And what about the feelings of your son? Convey says, there you stand at the centre of the debris of a shattered relationship, your son being outwardly submissive and inwardly suppressing feelings that would later come in uglier ways. Instead if you ask your son what his problem is and work on a solution that'd be beneficial to both of you wouldn't it  be nice? Afterall your son's well-being is your priority.example 2:  What is right in any given situation? Because if you and somebody are in a conflict and if something you think is right to you, it maybe wrong for the other person and vice versa. Here we have to go for win-win solution. Here, many people think "if he wins, I lose. Life is a competitive race". The fact is that, it is not so. Only 'very few' areas in life are like that. The actual problem is 'your scarcity mentality'.‚ÜíSuggestions for those who decided to read this book:1. Don't read this book in one go. Take atleast a week break after studying one habit and apply it in your college/work in your interaction with others.2. The first pages (till habit 1 starting) is somewhat boring for beginners. Don't feel your money is wasted after reading few pages. Hold on.3. Trust those universal principles. Don't ever doubt them.4. Repeat reading this book as many times as possible and I bet every time you will discover something new. The principles are highly practical that you may start applying them from day-1 itself.-> My experience:When i was reading this book, i could hardly wait for a week because each habit filled me with energy and curiosity for further habits to come. Several positive things happened in my life after I started applying these principles. I became friend with my enemies. I got new friends. Started being much more mature in my relations. Started taking academics seriously. Just to give you an example, one of my old friends with whom I had a falling out, later being friends again after two years said "You know, you have changed a lot! ".‚ÜíFinal words:If you have any problem in life, the book is worth reading because you are worth it! See most of the problems in your life. You have no ill intention towards anyone or anything. You try to be as perfect as possible. Inspite of all this, you will have problems. People hurt you. They just don't understand you. The problems are not because the other person is wrong or you are right. It is just that you don't have sufficient knowledge to deal with yourself and others.  Ignorance is okay but not willing to come out of it is not.Happy reading !Edit: Reviewed and made few minor corrections.

Name: Neelabh Pratap Singh
Title: Heartwarming rom com
Description: "The Law Of Attraction" by Laura Carter is a delightful beginning to the Brits In Manhattan series. Drew, the hot shot attorney, and Becky, the talented patisserie chef, make for an engaging pair. Their initial encounter at the breakfast bagel line sets the stage for a story filled with humor and undeniable chemistry.Drew's transformation from a workaholic lawyer to someone discovering the importance of a balanced life is well-crafted. Becky, with her secrets and guarded emotions, adds depth to the story. The flashback chapters revealing Becky's history provide a richer understanding of her character.The narration style is dual first person pov. But most chapters were dedicated to Drew and very few to Beckie.While I thoroughly enjoyed the character development and the growing connection between Drew and Becky, I felt that the story could have been more concise. Some parts seemed a bit drawn out, which affected the pacing.Overall, "The Law Of Attraction" is a loveable tale of two people navigating their way through New York City, complete with romance, humor, and intriguing characters. I look forward to the next installment in the series.

Name: Felicia Denise
Title: N/A
Description: Jade Wiltshire is a lottery winner and as word gets out, most people mistakenly believe she‚Äôs one of three winners sharing a ¬£60-million jackpot. And she doesn‚Äôt tell them any differently.Instead, she quits her mundane job at a care home for senior adults and proceeds to live like a millionaire. This includes jetting off for a holiday to Marbella, Spain. Sounds good? It isn‚Äôt. Jade is deathly afraid of flying. She‚Äôs also claustrophobic, and this leads her to purchase seats 2A, 2B, and 2C.After a harrowing bout of turbulence that convinces Jade the plane is going down, she tries to compose herself before landing. She meets a man, Isaac Marston, who returns her dropped book and has the temerity to sit in one of her seats. She lets it go though‚Ä¶ because he‚Äôs gorgeous and appears to be wealthy.Jade will make many, many more poor decisions, forever focused on the wrong thing.While I didn‚Äôt know exactly where the story was heading, I believed I had the villains figured out.I was wrong.A great plot twist had me cheering by the story‚Äôs midpoint! Did not see that coming! Original and unique! Two more twists before the end had me applauding!Isaac, of course, was the jerk I knew he‚Äôd be, but Logan was a disappointment. Marta was a superstar (and a shock), and well-written, as was her speed-demon hubby, Pablo. My heart broke for Astrid‚Ä¶ at first, and poor Emmeline.However, for me, Jade Wiltshire was problematic. For a woman on the other side of thirty, she behaved more like an errant teenager, attempting to be impressive and memorable. She thought herself clever and witty. She wasn‚Äôt, and she drank too much every time she drank; and Jade put her own selfish wants ahead of good common sense. Liking a character isn‚Äôt necessary to enjoy a book, but Jade‚Äôs actions cost the review a star. Also, while a suspenseful tale, The Girl in Seat 2A didn‚Äôt hit me as a thriller. Too much time in Jade‚Äôs frenetic mind bogged down the pace.A boon for the story was the author‚Äôs smart writing. Descriptive uses of historical places and events (non-US) always bring a smile to my face! Mystery lovers will enjoy this read and do definite double-takes at the plot twists!Enjoy!

Name: Quiline Kakoty
Title: A light weekend read
Description: We should not go for a deep analysis for some books. This is one of them. It's about a revenge story of a childhood love. Hiren came back after a decade to take revenge from his childhood sweetheart Meena but end up in loving her more and more. It's a story of their forever love.Although there are some point when I feel that it's just impossible for a poor guy to be a billionaire in 10 yeras. But then again I remember it's just a simple romance. I should not go for any logic. So I left all my logic aside and read the book as a romance. It's a light read that one can pick for a weekend. One can finish it like a masala movie.

Name: Cagneyfan67
Title: N/A
Description: I am a hardcore slasher movie fan. I remember when Scream redefined the genre in 1996 many other slashers started appearing. The first I Know What You Did Last Summer was good and Urban Legend followed in 1998. I used to watch these three a lot as a kid. It had a great plot teenagers being killed off due to Urban Legends. The ending was great too. As far as the cast goes. Alicia Witt was horribly miscast as the female lead. Witt is a good actress but doesn't quite fit here. Rebecca Gayheart gave the best performance in the movie in my opinion. I think she stepped it up. Jared Leto did good here. I liked him in Switchback. His acting was not phenomenal but certainly helped the movie. Loretta Devine gave this movie a boost playing a likable supporting character that you care about. Tara Reid wasn't good. Michael Rosenbaum is a very good actor but here it felt like he was directed to clone Matthew Lilard's character from Scream.  Appearances by horror icons Robert Englund, Brad Douriff and Danielle Harris are a treat for die hard horror movie fans. Englund has the largest part of the three. Watching this movie again I wish they have had given Danielle Harris the lead I am glad she has appeared in many recent horror movies after taking a vacation. Like Scream you spend time trying to guess the killer. That is part of what makes the slashers fun. Urban Legend is a fun horror movie with good acting and very nostalgic of those who grew up in the 90s. Urban Legend is certainly better than some of the slashers that come out today like Mr. Hush and Smiley. So give it a try! Have a great day!

Name: Daniel A. Foster
Title: N/A
Description: Jared Leto (AMERICAN PSYCHO), Alicia Witt (BONGWATER), Rebecca Gayheart (SCREAM 2), Michael Rosenbaum (SMALLVILLE), Tara Reid (AMERICAN PIE), Robert Englund (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET), Joshua Jackson (DAWSON'S CREEK), Loretta Devine (DOWN IN THE DELTA), Danielle Harris (HALLOWEEN 4: THE RETURN OF MICHAEL MYERS), Brad Dourif (CHILD'S PLAY), Vince Corazza (BRIDE OF CHUCKY), John Neville (THE ADVENTURES OF BARON MUNCHAUSEN), Natasha Gregson Wagner (BUFFY THE VAMPIRE SLAYER 1992) and Julian Ritchings star in URBAN LEGEND, a great addition to 90s horror lineups. This movie has a great concept and as with every other slasher movie launched the career a certain group of actors; in this case Michael Rosenbaum, Tara Reid and Joshua Jackson. This movie follows the rules to urban legends instead of horror movies. This movie has great kills such as the Drain-O down the throat and even though this is not a death scene the Pepsi foaming out of the mouth like a rabies infected animal. This movie is fun so give it a watch if you can. Be careful, double sided DVD. Infinity out of infinity star rating!

product: Bella Vita Luxury Woman Eau De Parfum Gift Set 4x20 ml for Women with Date, Senorita, Glam, Rose Perfume|Floral, Fruity Long Lasting EDP Fragrance Scent
Name: Ronald N.
Title: Great product for this price
Description: The case lid is a little flimsy. You need to be a little careful when opening and closing the case. The hinge seems to be the weakest part of this product.Both the mic and the receiver are made of good quality plastic. The clip on the mic is really good. Battery life from my initial usage is very good. I have recorded about 2 hours worth of footage with it and the battery light on the case is still green.Audio quality is also very good for the price. The noise cancellation is very acceptable and it cuts down background noise to a great extent. 3 levels of noise cancellation is very very good.Both the mic and the receiver have magnets that hold them well inside the case.There is a little free play in the mic and receiver when placed inside the case. Nothing that causes too much concern, but if it was held in place more securely it would have been a nice touch.Connectivity is really quick. If the mic is turned on and then the receiver is plugged in it connects right away. A red light will glow on the receiver to let you know it's connected. If you plug in the receiver first and then turn on the mic you may have to enable OTG in your phone settingsOverall I'm really happy with this product. Love the value for money it offers.

product: Bella Vita Luxury Woman Eau De Parfum Gift Set 4x20 ml for Women with Date, Senorita, Glam, Rose Perfume|Floral, Fruity Long Lasting EDP Fragrance Scent

Since I am a music head, I find that on the highest level of noise C, the voice seems to be sort of distorted, like a soft distortion pedal used.But I can manage that with EQ'ing the sound separately.All in all, nice piece.

product: Bella Vita Luxury Woman Eau De Parfum Gift Set 4x20 ml for Women with Date, Senorita, Glam, Rose Perfume|Floral, Fruity Long Lasting EDP Fragrance Scent
Name: sanjay gahlot
Title: its poor quality product
Description: Title: Disappointing Performance and Build QualityRating: ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜI recently purchased this Bluetooth microphone with high hopes of enhancing my audio experience, but unfortunately, it turned out to be a poor-quality product. Here's my review:Firstly, the performance was extremely disappointing. The microphone consistently produced distorted and muffled sound, making it practically unusable for any professional or even casual recording needs. The audio quality was far below expectations, with significant background noise and inconsistent volume levels.The build quality was equally subpar. The microphone felt cheaply made, with flimsy plastic components that lacked durability. After just a few uses, the microphone started exhibiting issues like loose connections and a fragile stand, making it unreliable and prone to damage.Connectivity was another major concern. The Bluetooth connection was unreliable and frequently dropped, causing disruptions during recordings and forcing me to reconnect frequently. This made the microphone highly inconvenient to use, especially in situations that required stable wireless connectivity.Battery life was also a letdown. Despite claims of extended battery performance, the microphone's battery drained quickly even with minimal usage. This made it inconvenient for longer recording sessions, requiring frequent recharging or replacement batteries.Customer support was unresponsive and unhelpful. When I reached out to address these issues, I received no assistance or resolution, leaving me feeling frustrated and dissatisfied with both the product and the company's support.Overall, I cannot recommend this poor-quality Bluetooth microphone. Its disappointing performance, low build quality, unreliable connectivity, short battery life, and lack of customer support make it an unreliable and regrettable purchase. Save your money and invest in a more reputable and reliable alternative to avoid the frustrations I experienced.

product: Bella Vita Luxury Woman Eau De Parfum Gift Set 4x20 ml for Women with Date, Senorita, Glam, Rose Perfume|Floral, Fruity Long Lasting EDP Fragrance Scent
Name: Sumit Zitshi
Title: Thoroughly impressed with the wireless mic
Description: I bought this mic to record audio and aid in my YouTube journey. I was hesitant purchasing an expensive mic to begin with and definitely didn‚Äôt have the need or want to spend a lot on microphone.Came across this mic and saw some positive reviews. The price was just too good to be true. So without much hesitation I purchased it some it cost me only 1600 and to my surprise it delivers. It‚Äôs nothing fancy and gets the job done decently, but the most amazing part of using this is the noise cancellation. At level 3 it just suppresses the environmental noise a lot. Clarity is decent as well.The best part is that it comes with type c to lightening adapter for iPhone use and that adapter itself would cost more than 500 on Amazon. Not sure how they are able to deliver so much for the price, but I literally have no complaints.In the long run I wills love to get something like DJI Mic 2, but for most purposes this mic is sufficient and does the job.Would need to see how it holds up for the next couple of months.

product: Mathematics class 10th and MCQs - by R.D. Sharma (2024-25 Examination)
Name: Rahul babu
Title: Best for bigners
Description: I recently purchased a C scale flute from Radhe Flutes and I am very impressed with it. The flute is made of high-quality PVC fiber and is very durable. It is also very easy to play and has a beautiful, rich sound.The flute came in a very nice package and was well-protected. It also came with a velvet bag and a carrying case.I am a beginner flute player and I found this flute to be very easy to learn on. The holes are well-spaced and the keys are easy to press. The sound of the flute is very clear and pure.I have been playing this flute for a few weeks now and I am very happy with it. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good quality, affordable flute.**Pros:*** High-quality construction* Beautiful sound* Easy to play* Affordable**Cons:*** None that I have foundOverall, I am very happy with my Radhe C scale flute. It is a great instrument for beginners and experienced players alike. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good quality flute.

product: Arihant NTA CUET UG Exam Guide For Section 3 General Test With Practice Sets and Solved Paper For 2024 Exams
Name: Shubh
Title: Best performance for price.
Description: A few days beck, I went on amazon to buy a new mic for my work from home and make casual videos. I heard somewhere that boya has the best mics BUT IT IS NOT TRUE because some people told me that the boya mic needs a battery and has a unnecessary long cable which gets tangled very often and I suppose that you very well know that un-tangling a long cable is a nightmare so I decided to get a mic from some other brand and when I started searching for a good mic which had some good reviews I came across the MAONO AU-400 Microphone. Firstly, when I saw the packaging of the microphone and the accessories included in there product photos I was pretty sure that the mic would cost a ton but little did I know that it only costed 298INR which was way cheap. Of course we all have a default opinion that If an item is cheap its quality would not be up to the mark and I also thoght the same, but after reading some reviews I realised that this is a great product.NOW LET'S GET TO THE REVIEWthe product was delivered within 3 days and as soon as I open the packing I found a box in pristine condition and my bill. Inside the box you get a carrying pouch which is of great quality and feels nice to touch, the microphone itselfand a 4pole to 3pole jack converter which was gold plated to connect the mic with a camera and record audio.The mic has a 4pole jack so I can be directly connected to your smartphones or laptops unlike some other microphones which require an audio splitter which will cost you another 70-80 Rupees, which is a nice thingThe audio quality was also great but I think my mic had a some kind of problem as I was also capturing some wind noises as soon as I noticed it I contacted the customer care and I was provided with an instant solution for my problem. 5-STARS TO THE BRAND's CUSTOMER CARE.MY MIC NOW WORKS PERFECTLY AND I AM VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHARE. Below are some things I like:1. 4-pole jack.2. It picks up sound equally from all directions.3. 78 inches long cord.4. An Extra 3-pin Adapter for DSLR.5. A good carrying pouch.6. Excellent Service.

product: Arihant NTA CUET UG Exam Guide For Section 3 General Test With Practice Sets and Solved Paper For 2024 Exams

product: Arihant NTA CUET UG Exam Guide For Section 3 General Test With Practice Sets and Solved Paper For 2024 Exams

Title: Best microphone under 1k rs
Description: Nice quality

product: Arihant NTA CUET UG Exam Guide For Section 3 General Test With Practice Sets and Solved Paper For 2024 Exams
Name: ADITYA UBRHANDE
Title: Product Good, Packaging damaged.
Description: The first time I had ordered this mic, I received in a amazon plastic bag and the product box inside was completely damaged and was sealed using cello tape. Also, the mic seller sent me was damaged and had low quality audio. It was a duplicate.But, when I replaced, I received the packing in a cardboard box but still the inner box had a few damages.The mix received inside was good.Here is a detailed review of the mic:1. The quality: Quality overall nice. The wire might seem filthy and weak but in reality when I tested it, it was indeed a bit durable. It can easily sustain a bit of a pull and twist. Just mind the spots when the wire meets the audio jack and the mic2. Sound quality: Sound quality is really nice. BUT BUT BUT... before you think of buying it, read the paragraph below (of noise cancellation). The mic catches sound equally even if you are from far away or close to it.3. Noise Cancellation: This is a major point. I used to mic a lot for testing purposes. Let me share my experience. I tested it in different environments.a. In a closed room with AC and total silence: In such environment, you will get crisp sound like a boom microphone. But, you will also receive a bit of white noise or background static noise which you can easily reduce using the noise reduction feature.b. In a room with ceiling fan on and moderate noise: Still seems good but not great. Your vocals would still be crispy and clear but the background noise will increase. Still if you use nice noise reduction software (like Audacity) it will sound great. Adding background music to your video would help.c. In a room with standing fan on and high noise: Not recommended at all. Not only this mic but any mic would capture a TON of noise. To express statistically, there will be atleast 40% noise of wind whooshing in the background.d. The same high noise room with windows open: You will die doing noise reduction. Not gonna lie, the background noise increases by 60 times.  DONT TRY THIS.The pop filter or the sponge on the top of the mic helps a lot. When you are speaking close to the mic, a lot of air goes in while speaking. So, when the "filter" is attached, the output sound does not have air whooshing but with the filter removed, the output sound is only air.Now, to sum up...Mic is overall good. Noise cancellation is not great but yeah, for the price range, it is the best!Recording tips:1. Record in a silent room with A/C or else turn on the fan at the least speed so it doesn't make much noise.2. Use the collar clip to place the mic, don't hold it in hand. ( I mean this is common sense :-P )3. If transmission lines (electricity wires which are above the head) go from close to your room, I would recommend changing rooms.Now, the reason for this is that sometimes, the mic can catch electromagnetic intefrerence.  This maono mic won't catch it but I recommend this for generic mics.4. Do noise reduction in Audacity. It is very effective than the inbuilt noise reduction tools in video editors. Also, it is very easy.Also, BOYA BY-M1 MIC SOUNDS ALMOST THE SAME AS THIS MIC. There is only like 2% difference in noise cancellation. But, I would still give both of them 3 stars for noise cancellation.THAT'S IT!Hope you understand what I mean to say.Peace out.

product: Arihant NTA CUET UG Exam Guide For Section 3 General Test With Practice Sets and Solved Paper For 2024 Exams
Name: Android Member
Title: Great Quality Mic. with Aggressive Price
Description: Well I am writing this review not only because it's a great product, but I am reviewing it so that people know each and every aspect of it and decide whether to buy this or not.It is an omnidirectional microphone that captures audio from all the directions. And because of this, whatever sound falls on it is all recorded.Noise cancellation has been given inside it, due to this it separates the noise and only records the sound. But I felt that it could not separate the noise so well.I liked its audio quality that it captures and it has a little bass and depth which I liked very much. Its build quality is good and according to this price is quite good.I posted a full review video including recording samples on my YT channel "Android Member" you can check that out as well for better understanding.There are many things with this mic such as a carry pouch and TRRS to TRS converter. The price of this converter will be equal to the price of this mic in the market.So I do not understand how this company is able to give so much at this price. I think this is a very good deal.Pros1. Packaging: Packaging and Box content at this price is surprisingly great. Carry Pouch and TRRS to TRS converter just got me thinking how even it is possible to pack so much at this price.2. Price: As I said above it's price is very aggressive and I am not seeing anything better than this, I think it's a great deal.3. Audio Quality: It captures really good audio and you hardly differentiate between this mic and a high end mic like Boya BY M1.Cons1. Wire length is only 2 meters and that's enough for me but for some people it isn't.2. Noise Cancellation is there but not that great, it's not bad but it's not great I would say it's average.

We desperately needed to find a good oral care treat for my Labrador (6 years old), who isn't a huge fan of chewing on toys and doesn't let us brush his teeth. I came across this a while back and now it's a monthly purchase. We give him one stick a day. He really loves the taste. I can see changes in his oral health. There is less plaque or foul smell, but it is a very slow process, as I could only see the results after months of usage.If you want to buy dentastix for your dog, keep in mind the weight of your dog because they have three different sizes: small, medium and large. product: BRAHMASTRA Complete Maths Multicolored Formula Book Second Edition BILINGUAL by Aditya Ranjan Sir
Name: Bharat Joshi
Title: A Clean and Convenient Solution for Cat Owners!
Description: I recently purchased the Scoopable Smart Bentonite Cat Litter and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance.The litter is extremely absorbent, effectively soaking up liquids and controlling odors. My home has never smelled fresher! The clumping feature is a game-changer - it makes cleaning the litter box a breeze. The clumps are easy to scoop and don't break apart, which means less mess and waste.What sets this product apart is its dust-free formula. It's a relief to know that my cats are not inhaling any harmful dust particles during their bathroom breaks. Plus, it's great not having to deal with a dusty residue around the litter box or on my furniture.The litter is also soft on my cats' paws, which is an important factor for me. I've noticed that my cats seem more comfortable using their litter box since I made the switch.In terms of value for money, the Scoopable Smart Bentonite Cat Litter is worth every penny. Given its high performance and the amount of product you get, I find it to be a cost-effective choice.Delivery was prompt and the packaging was sturdy, ensuring the product arrived in perfect condition.In conclusion, I highly recommend the Scoopable Smart Bentonite Cat Litter. It delivers on its promises and has made maintaining my cats' litter box a much simpler and more pleasant task.

product: BRAHMASTRA Complete Maths Multicolored Formula Book Second Edition BILINGUAL by Aditya Ranjan Sir
Name: Semantsen
Title: Very nice product
Description: Clupms easily. No odour. Easy to clean. Using since 5 years.

product: BRAHMASTRA Complete Maths Multicolored Formula Book Second Edition BILINGUAL by Aditya Ranjan Sir
Name: Aadith Prasad
Title: Dont be fooled by the manufacturer's claims
Description: I have using this product for several months now. I have 2 cats and two trays for them respectively. Let me share my unbiased experience with this product.1) Dust related - This product is definitely not dust free (They claim it is 99.9% dust free). In fact, You will literally see dust flying in the air, when you pour the whole 5 kg pack into a container. Not only that, over a period of time, you will see dust develop in the tray when you start shaking the tray.2) Problems with clumping - The product clumps well only when you fill the tray to sufficient levels (half the tray at least or about 1.5 inches from the bottom of tray). Otherwise the pee will stick to the bottom of the tray and you will have to scrape the damn thing off each time.3) Fragrance - There is a very pleasant fragrance initially. However over a period of time (I scoop both the trays twice a day), it starts to smell really really bad, if by chance the levels of cat litter have diminished or the clumping has broken down and the brown residue starts to permeate with the freshly added litter. When this happens, i have to throw the whole contents of the tray into the dustbin. I usually do this once in 2 months, but it is probably advisable to do it earlier.4) My final verdict... Keep the levels of cat litter high, keep a cat litter fragrance spray handy and clean out the tray twice a day. Only then is it manageable with no issues.I am testing out other products as well. I tried the "Petcrux Pine wood" at it was a far better product in terms of fragrance and clumping issues, however the only major drawback was that the wood would disintegrate into a powdery form and i had to spend 5-8 minutes removing the powdered wood each time a day from the tray. Though it is ways more expensive initially (Rs 1200 for 10kgs), it lasts much longer (2 to 2.5 months) versus 1 month of this product (Rs 655 for 10 kgs).

product: BRAHMASTRA Complete Maths Multicolored Formula Book Second Edition BILINGUAL by Aditya Ranjan Sir
Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Best litter on the market
Description: I just purchased a two pack of this litter. I have always purchased pet exclusive or odourlock cat litter before this. I have to say that this is the best litter I have ever. My cat always digs and leaves a lump stuck to the bottom of the litter tray that breaks up into pieces when I try to scoop it. The litter becomes smelly within a few days because one cannot remove the very tiny pieces of the clumps that are left. I was amazed at the tight clumps that are formed after using this litter making scooping up the clumps easier. There wqs no smelly  residue or clumps stuck to the bottom.I have purchased a four pack and hope that the manufacturers maintain the quality and consistency.Update : I was very impressed and ordered 5 packets of the same litter again. I paid the entire amount by debit card. When the litter was delivered the carton was torn and damaged. The cardboard carton was almost open and to my shock there was only one packet of litter instead of five. This is very unprofessional. And I had just posted a glowing review. Shoddy service by the seller. I refused to accept the delivery and returned it back to the courier. Seller is totally unprofessional. Accepting money and then sending only one packet.

product: BRAHMASTRA Complete Maths Multicolored Formula Book Second Edition BILINGUAL by Aditya Ranjan Sir
Name: Shreya S.
Title: Do Not Buy
Description: I have always used bentonite litter for multiple cats without any issues at all. This is the first time purchasing clay litter. Below are the list of issues i am facing:1. Does not clump : Its brown and does not clump at all.Thus you will not be able to differentiate the wet litter so either you will be discarding partial dirty litter or will have to throw 100% of it.2.** Impossible pungent smell : absolutely no smell control. It gives out a pungent smell which is impossible to bear. Feeling puckish all the time because of it.Since the whole house now smells like poop and piss, my cats have started pooping and pissing every where!!Its not just my cats, i have seen the same behavioural change in another household as well.They have stopped stepping on the litter because of the smell which i totally understand.I am using room freshner 24x7 but still failing to curb the smell. Forget using the AC.3. Insect infestation : i can see lots of insects flying in & around the litter all because of the smell4. Tracking : the litter stays stuck in the paws and tracks everywhere. Mops are not able to easily clean the floor as it leaves a red marking. Its a nightmare cleaning the mop in the bathroom as it leaves residue which doesn‚Äôt get washed easily and clogs the pipesCleaning schedule: i am forced to clean the dump 5/6 times a day now. For bentonite it was only once a day.My cats are not liking it at all neither am i. I have never faced such issues with bentonite clay.Its a nightmare for me as i have 15 kgs left to use.Worst spend ever

Name: gurmehar singh
Title: Highly recommended
Description: I recently tried the Meat Up Calcium Bone Pouch for my furry friend, and it has proven to be an excellent addition to his daily routine. Here's a detailed review based on my experience:**Ingredients and Nutrition:**One of the standout features of the Meat Up Calcium Bone is its nutritional content. It is fortified with calcium, which is crucial for maintaining strong bones and teeth in dogs. The inclusion of quality ingredients contributes to the overall well-being of my pet.**Taste and Palatability:**My dog's enthusiasm for the Meat Up Calcium Bone is a testament to its palatability. The enticing flavor appeals to his taste buds, making it an enjoyable treat. This is particularly important as dogs can be picky eaters, and finding treats they genuinely love is a win.**Texture and Size:**The size of the bone is suitable for medium to large-sized dogs. The texture is robust enough to encourage healthy chewing, promoting dental health by reducing plaque and tartar buildup. The bone's durability ensures that it lasts long enough to provide a satisfying chewing experience.**Digestibility:**I appreciate that the Meat Up Calcium Bone is easily digestible. This is crucial for my dog's digestive health, and the fact that it doesn't cause any gastrointestinal issues is reassuring. It's a treat I feel confident giving regularly without concerns about digestion.**Convenience:**The individual pouch packaging is a thoughtful touch. It keeps the bones fresh and maintains their integrity. The resealable nature of the pouch ensures that the remaining bones stay fresh for the next use. It's a convenient packaging design for pet owners.**Enriched with Vitamins:**In addition to calcium, the Meat Up Calcium Bone is enriched with vitamins that contribute to overall health. This holistic approach to pet nutrition is appreciated, as it goes beyond just being a treat and provides additional benefits.**Value for Money:**Considering the nutritional value, palatability, and overall positive impact on my dog's health, the Meat Up Calcium Bone offers good value for money. Investing in treats that contribute to my pet's well-being is a priority, and this product aligns with that goal.**Positive Impact on Dental Health:**Regular chewing on the Meat Up Calcium Bone has visibly improved my dog's dental health. The chewing action helps keep his teeth clean and reduces the risk of dental issues. It's a preventive measure that aligns with the importance of oral care in dogs.In conclusion, the Meat Up Calcium Bone Pouch has become a preferred treat for my dog. Its nutritional value, palatability, and positive impact on dental health make it a standout product. If you're looking for a treat that goes beyond just being enjoyable and contributes to your pet's overall well-being, the Meat Up Calcium Bone is a highly recommended choice.

Description: 1. "Comfort Redefined!": The Crocs Literide is a game-changer when it comes to comfort. Its innovative design and lightweight construction make it feel like walking on clouds. Whether I'm running errands or spending a day on my feet, these shoes provide unparalleled support and cushioning. Plus, they're easy to clean and incredibly durable. I can't recommend them enough!2. "Versatile and Stylish!": Say goodbye to bulky sneakers and uncomfortable sandals‚Äîthe Crocs Literide is here to revolutionize your footwear game. Not only are they incredibly comfortable, but they also look great with any outfit. Whether I'm pairing them with jeans for a casual day out or dressing them up with shorts for a beach trip, they always add a touch of style and flair. Plus, the variety of colors and designs means there's a pair for everyone!3. "Perfect for Active Lifestyles!": As someone with an active lifestyle, I can't rave enough about the Crocs Literide. Whether I'm hitting the gym, going for a hike, or simply running errands, these shoes provide the perfect blend of comfort and performance. The lightweight design and supportive cushioning keep my feet feeling fresh and energized all day long. Plus, they're easy to slip on and off, making them ideal for those on-the-go moments. "Durable and Long-lasting!": I've had my Crocs Literide for months now, and they still look and feel as good as the day I bought them. Whether I'm walking through puddles, navigating rocky terrain, or just lounging around the house, these shoes never disappoint. They're truly a testament to Crocs' commitment to quality and innovation.5. "The Ultimate Travel Companion!": If you're a frequent traveler like me, the Crocs Literide is an absolute must-have.
