Title: DOCTOR EXTRA SOFT Men's Classic Ultra Soft Sliders: A Review
Description: Comfort Above All: Forget those flimsy flip flops that dig into your heels. These DOCTOR EXTRA SOFT sliders provide a spa-like experience for your feet with their super-soft cushioned footbed. You'll feel like you're walking on clouds, whether you're lounging at home, running errands, or hitting the pool.Lightweight Champions: Forget clunky clogs, these sliders are feather-light thanks to their EVA construction. They won't weigh you down or tire your feet after a long day.Style Meets Function: Ditch the boring flip flops! These sliders come in a range of sleek and stylish colors, giving your casual look a boost. Choose from classic black, sporty navy, or a pop of color like orange or olive green.Grip and Go: No need to worry about slipping and sliding. The textured anti-skid sole provides solid traction on wet surfaces, making them perfect for poolside relaxation or rainy day errands.Waterproof Warriors: Don't let a little water get in your way. These EVA sliders are completely waterproof, ready to conquer puddles, splashes, and even the occasional hose-down.Everyday Essentials: Whether you're kicking back at home, enjoying a barbecue with friends, or hitting the beach, these DOCTOR EXTRA SOFT sliders are your go-to choice for effortless comfort and style. They're versatile enough to pair with shorts, jeans, or even swim trunks, making them a true wardrobe staple.Verdict: For those seeking ultimate comfort, lightweight ease, and a touch of style, the DOCTOR EXTRA SOFT Men's Classic Ultra Soft Sliders are a winner. They're perfect for everyday wear, offering superior cushion, reliable grip, and water-resistant freedom. With a plethora of color choices, you can find the perfect pair to match your personality and complement your casual look. If you're looking for an upgrade from your basic flip flops, these sliders are definitely worth a try!Pros:Super-soft, cushioned footbedLightweight and comfortableStylish design with various colorsAnti-skid sole for better gripWaterproof constructionVersatile for everyday wearCons:Might not be suitable for formal occasionsSizes might run slightly smallOverall, the DOCTOR EXTRA SOFT Men's Classic Ultra Soft Sliders are a great choice for anyone seeking comfortable and stylish everyday footwear. Their cloud-like feel, lightweight design, and anti-skid grip make them ideal for lounging, running errands, or enjoying outdoor activities. With a range of colors to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect pair to express your style.

product: Own Your Body: A Doctor's Life-saving Tips
Name: Hunky
Title: Vocal for local, Made in India, Trust of Bata
Description: Bata is our household name since many decades. They are made in India shoe and they are known for their quality leather, build quality and overall durability. They dont spend anything in advertisement and for many decades they pass on that benefit to us the customer with their awesome product quality under affordable pricing.This is a simple formal shoe for office use or formal party wear. Remember, this is their entry level offering and when comparing to anything else, compare under same category of products.Leather quality at this price point is excellent & built quality is very good. However, pointy nose design may make this shoe feel uncomfortable for long walks or regular use for any one with fat toe.This shoe has no extra layer of under feet protection. If you feel the need of that, you may need to order those extra shoe jel thing to place inside the sole. Bata should consider making some models with soft under feet inside sole, new generation look for that feature.Rebook / Puma / Addidas No.8 will need Bata No.7. Keep that in mind, go one size lower.Overall happy with the purchase, as always, really happy to see brands like Bata with local production available in Amazon. Men of my family are happy customers of bata since many generations.Amazon return / replace policy is excellent, it is a satisfying and headache free purchase experience with Amazon.

product: Interact in English Literature + Main Course Book (MCB) + Workbook | A textbook for English course (Communicative) - Combo Set of 3 Books For Class 10
Name: Raspreet Singh
Title: Not a useful product for most purposes
Description: I've been using various insoles for over 5 years now due to Plantar Fasciitis - products ranging from simple Gel/ memory foam insoles starting Rs 100-150, all the way to customized Norwegian insoles costing Rs 6,000 per pair. I keep trying new things to strike the right balance between the cost and the benefit obtained.Let's see what does this product do versus what it claims. If you have any condition related to pain in the heel or sole of your feet (PF, Flat feet etc.), this product won't help - the  most critical thing for that is not the cushioning but a good arch support. This insole has practically NO arch support contrary to claim. It's absolutely flat.Is the cushioning good? Well most shoes that are priced upwards of even Rs1,000 and of a reasonably good company will give you good cushioning - it is neither expensive, nor technically difficult to achieve. The more difficult is to achieve a good arch support and proper distribution of pressure and the heel and foot lands. That comes is really expensive sports shoes - and practically absent in formal shoes. If you're buying really very cheap  fancy shoes, you may want to improve on that before buying cheap accessories for those shoes - as it's not going help.The really good insoles that I have found in the last so many years is the Dr Scholls that cost around Rs 2,500 or so per pair on Amazon. Apart from that I've yet not found any product that works. I use those for my formal shoes that I wear to work - for casual/sports - one is better off buying good branded shoes with arch support.

Name: Subhojit Mallik
Title: Liberty AHa Slippers - Affordable, Heavenly Comfort, and Refreshing Fragrance!
Description: I recently purchased a pair of Liberty AHa slippers, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase! These slippers not only come at an unbelievably affordable price but also deliver exceptional comfort that rivals some of the most high-end options on the market. Additionally, the refreshing fragrance that greets you when you open the package is an unexpected bonus!Let's talk about the comfort first. As soon as I slipped my feet into these slippers, I felt like I was walking on clouds. The plush interior lining provides a cozy and cushioned feel, making every step a delight. The slippers have a perfect fit, offering adequate support to my feet without feeling too tight or restrictive. Whether I'm strolling around the house or lounging on the couch, these slippers provide the utmost comfort throughout the day.What surprised me the most was the pleasant scent that emanated from the slippers when I first opened the package. The refreshing fragrance adds an extra touch of luxury and invigorates my senses every time I wear them. It's a small detail, but it definitely enhances the overall experience and makes slipping into these slippers even more enjoyable.In terms of durability, the Liberty AHa slippers have proven to be quite sturdy. Despite wearing them daily, they have held up remarkably well. The quality materials used in their construction ensure that they withstand regular use and continue to provide the same level of comfort even after extended wear. The soles have a good grip, which gives me confidence when walking on various surfaces, both indoors and outdoors.Another great aspect of these slippers is their versatility. They are suitable for all seasons, keeping my feet warm in the colder months and cool during summer. The open-back design makes them easy to slip on and off, saving me time and effort. Plus, they come in a variety of colors and designs, allowing you to choose the style that suits your taste.To top it all off, the affordability of the Liberty AHa slippers is truly remarkable. Despite their exceptional comfort and quality, they are priced much lower than many other slippers on the market. It's a fantastic value for money, and I highly recommend them to anyone in need of comfortable and affordable footwear.In conclusion, the Liberty AHa slippers have exceeded my expectations in every way. They provide heavenly comfort, emit a refreshing fragrance, and come at an unbeatable price. If you're looking for a pair of slippers that offer exceptional comfort without breaking the bank, look no further than Liberty AHa. Your feet will thank you for it!

Name: Manav
Title: Comfortable Casuals for Everyday Wear
Description: It is a decent addition to your collection of casual footwear. While it may not boast groundbreaking features, it certainly holds its own in terms of comfort and everyday functionality.Crafted from EVA material, these flip-flops offer a lightweight and easygoing feel. The slip-on design with a thong strap makes them convenient for quick wear, especially during those laid-back, casual outings. The flat heel type adds to the simplicity, making them suitable for various occasions.The brown color is a versatile choice, blending well with different outfits and adding a subtle touch of style. They are categorized as casual slippers, fitting seamlessly into your lifestyle for everyday wear. Whether you're heading to the store or taking a leisurely stroll, these thongs provide a comfortable and effortless option.Being non-water-resistant, these flip flops might not be the best choice for wet or rainy conditions. However, for dry weather and indoor use, they serve their purpose well. The care instructions recommend airing them out regularly to keep them fresh, a simple routine that ensures longevity.One notable aspect is the product's country of origin, proudly made in India. Supporting local craftsmanship is always a positive feature, and Liberty has delivered a pair of casual thongs that align with the brand's reputation for reliable footwear.In conclusion, it is a decent choice for those seeking a comfortable and straightforward pair of flip flops for everyday wear. While it may not offer advanced features, its simplicity, comfort, and versatile design make it a reliable option for casual outings and relaxed moments.

Its real-time scanning and threat detection capabilities are top-notch, effectively identifying and neutralizing malware, ransomware, viruses, and other online threats. With McAfee Antivirus, I can browse the web, download files, and open attachments with confidence, knowing that my system is shielded from potential harm.One aspect that truly impressed me about McAfee Antivirus is its proactive approach to security. It continually updates its virus definitions and employs advanced heuristic algorithms to detect emerging threats, even before they are officially recognized. This proactive stance ensures that I'm always protected against the latest and most sophisticated malware strains, providing me with peace of mind in an ever-evolving threat landscape.Another notable feature of McAfee Antivirus is its robust firewall, which acts as an additional line of defense against unauthorized access attempts and malicious network activities. It effectively monitors incoming and outgoing traffic, blocking any suspicious connections and ensuring that my sensitive data remains secure. With McAfee Antivirus's firewall in place, I feel confident in the integrity of my network, whether I'm at home or connected to public Wi-Fi.One of the standout aspects of McAfee Antivirus is its intuitive and user-friendly interface. Navigating through the software's various features and settings is a breeze, even for those with limited technical expertise. McAfee Antivirus's clean and organized layout provides quick access to key functionalities, making it easy to initiate scans, schedule automated tasks, and customize security preferences according to individual needs. The software's simplicity doesn't compromise its effectiveness; instead, it enhances the overall user experience.Furthermore, McAfee Antivirus's impact on system performance is minimal. Unlike some antivirus solutions that can slow down your device, McAfee Antivirus operates efficiently in the background, without causing any noticeable lag or disruptions. This balance between robust security and optimized performance ensures that I can carry out my tasks seamlessly without compromising on protection.Lastly, the customer support provided by McAfee Antivirus is exceptional. Their responsive and knowledgeable team is always available to address any queries or concerns promptly. Whether it's troubleshooting an issue or seeking guidance on best practices, I have consistently received timely assistance, further enhancing the overall experience of using McAfee Antivirus.In conclusion, McAfee Antivirus is an outstanding antivirus solution that has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Its comprehensive protection, proactive security measures, user-friendly interface, minimal impact on system performance, and excellent customer support make it a true standout in the realm of digital security. I highly recommend McAfee Antivirus to anyone seeking unbeatable protection and peace of mind for their valuable digital assets.

Name: B999N
Title: Misleading descriptions, not a true successor of Total Security
Description: Kaspersky Premium is being advertised as a replacement + upgrade for Total security.So, most of the old users of Total Security would automatically be looking at this as the upgrade when it's time to renew your subscription.And this offers a free vpn with unlimited bandwidth. Sounds great. Right?Well. You can only use your subscription in one device. Unlike total  security where one subscription was enough for your computer AND mobile, you can only use your vpn subscription on your computer OR Mobile.Edit: Correction. Total security was being sold as 1 year/ 1 user. Now that's also for 1 year/1 device. So the description itself has changed.I am having the same issue with the antivirus in android platform, it's still showing as 'free' though I have a premium subscription, which is shown under subscriptions.Automatic scans and other premium features are turned off... BUT I can turn on the VPN premium if I turn off the feature on pc from my dashboard/mykaspersky.There are other issues like unsupported browsers for secure browsing, but let's set that aside.You're not getting the same as you used to under total security.The VPN is not really all that good if you have used a premium vpn like nord,express or even surfshark. (I got them because Kaspersky total had only 200MB per day lol).To me antivirus/security that's useful in both mobile and pc was what made total security really attractive.Now I'd have to look for alternatives.P.SThe installation needs to be done from the link provided by the seller. Kaspersky would redirect to installation on plus rather than premium.(This review is only for people considering changing from Total to Premium, Kaspersky is still a great antivirus for PC, I am having trouble accessing premium version in android.)Edit:The VPN works. But the presence of Indian server means they have given the Indian government the access to your data. Meaning they themselves can access your data (you can't share the data that you yourself don't have access to). This defeats the purpose of paying extra for privacy.The good thing about the vpn is that it has ipv6 that even nord doesn't support. It also masks ip in qbittorrent that without reconfiguring any settings.I have increased the rating to 3 stars, it would be 4 if it didn't have Indian server or if it specifically mentioned that  it's connecting to a virtual server in India rather than have a physical server which would mean it'd need to lose the privacy certificate.

Title: Avoid McAfee Antivirus - Terrible Customer Support and Incompatible with M1 Chip
Description: my terrible experience with McAfee antivirus. I purchased McAfee antivirus based on its reputation for being a reliable and effective security solution. However, I quickly realized that this was a mistake.The first problem I encountered was that McAfee was not compatible with my M1 chip MacBook Pro. This was despite the product description clearly stating that it supported macOS. I contacted McAfee customer support for assistance, but they were unable to provide a solution. I was told that McAfee would not be providing support for M1 chips in the foreseeable future.I was incredibly disappointed with McAfee's lack of support. I had purchased their product in good faith, and I was now left with an incompatible antivirus program that I could not use. I tried to get a refund, but McAfee refused. They claimed that I had used the product for too long to be eligible for a refund.To make matters worse, my laptop became infected with malware shortly after I installed McAfee antivirus. I believe this was due to the fact that the antivirus was not compatible with my M1 chip. I had to spend hours cleaning up the malware infection, and my laptop was never the same.I strongly recommend avoiding McAfee antivirus. It is an overpriced product that is not compatible with M1 chips. Additionally, McAfee's customer support is terrible, and they will not refund you if you are unhappy with their product.Also I paid the services with no use at all. Please do not buy this product if anyone using Mac. its false discription mentioned that mcafee will support in mac

Name: Andy
Title: Good product but pathetic post-sales support!
Description: Ease of use/ administration: I purchased this software in July 2021 for my family and found that two licenses of McAfee Total Protection (each for 5 devices) has been sent to my email address. The McAfee Customer Support expressed their inability to combine the two licenses into one, which made my task of administering this software tedious on family devices (PCs, tablets, mobile phones) especially during re-installation. I had to literally remember which license (out of the two identical licenses) was used by me and which one by my family, specially when the family member(s) uses the same manufacturer/ model.Bundled Products: McAfee Antivirus, McAfee Internet Security (Firewall) are the industry led products which defintely great! Apart from this the other products viz. McAfee Secure VPN, True Key by McAfee (Password Manager), Web Boost, Tracker Remover, Browser Security etc. are being worked upon by the product team. Out of all these bundled products, I did have issues with 'True Key by McAfee', which didn't prompt me for saved passwords on many websites. This product, which works as a browser extension, logs the user out multiple times in a day from mobile device(s) thus impacting the productivity where one has to repeatedly log-in to the interface to fetch the password. I established multiple sessions with McAfee Consumer Technical Support team, to check if any of my user options are causing this behavior. A ticket was also created for this issue, but this was resolved with a stanard resolution after 3 months....Apart from that I also contacted the support team to change my phone number on the profile, but they haven't done that even after 3 weeks, so the McAfee Support really sucks...Price: The price of this product has increased by 5% from 2021, which is not advisable considering the ease of use and the post-sales support. Still this price is comparatively good price in comparison to other products in the market.

Name: Tony Jacob
Title: One of the best racquets Yonex has developed
Description: Before I was hospitalized for a complicated Appendix surgery I always wanted to purchase this racquet. Finally on a Prime day sale I managed to secure one for myself. I have used Lining badminton racquets before and let me tell you, they produce top notch quality racquets.What other players mostly complain1. This racquet is made in China so the quality may not be good2. Racquet broke in just a matter of few days after playing.3. String broke in few days or weeks4. The frame broke after playing for few hours.All these claims are real but TOTALLY AND SOLELY DEPEND ON PLAYERS.REAL REASONS WHY IT HAPPENS READ BELOW.1. You see, be it any racquet, first of all they are not meant to be played using a PLASTIC SHUTTLE COCK, your strings and racquet may break.2. While playing doubles when your racquet clashes with another player's racquet there is a high possibility of breaking the frame of your racquet soon.3. When you put the tension of your racquet beyond 26LBS and playing with a plastic shuttle cock also smashing the shuttle cock frequently, the frame and strings break.These are some of the real reasons for your racquet to break. Focus on improving your technique while playing. Some racquets are designed for players for a specific purpose.Choosing a right racquet may be time consuming, but it pays off, choose wisely according to your playing ability.HAPPY PLAYING üòä

Name: Chaitanya b.
Title: Yonex Nanoray Light 18i Badminton Racquet: A Review for Agile Players
Description: The Yonex Nanoray Light 18i badminton racquet is known for its **lightweight design and head-light balance**, making it a popular choice for **defensive players** who prioritize quick reflexes and maneuverability. Here's a breakdown of its key features and user experiences:**Pros:*** **Ultra-lightweight (77 grams):** This racquet is exceptionally light, allowing for **fast swings and effortless maneuverability**, especially during quick net exchanges and defensive recoveries.* **Head-light balance:** The weight is concentrated towards the handle, further enhancing **control and swing speed**, making it easier to react quickly to smashes and play delicate drops.* **Good for beginners and doubles play:** The lightweight construction and maneuverability make it **easier to learn the basics** and ideal for **doubles play** where quick reactions are crucial.* **Decent price point:** Compared to other high-end Yonex racquets, the Nanoray 18i is **relatively affordable**, making it accessible to a wider range of players.**Cons:*** **Limited power:** Due to its lightweight design, the Nanoray 18i might not pack the same punch as heavier racquets when it comes to smashes and clear shots. This can be a disadvantage for players who prefer an aggressive playing style.* **Requires good technique:** The head-light balance, while offering control, can be **less forgiving for players with imperfect technique**. Mishits can result in weaker shots and less accuracy.* **Durability concerns:** Some users report concerns about the durability of the racquet, especially if used for powerful smashes or with high-tension strings.**Overall:**The Yonex Nanoray Light 18i is a **solid choice for beginner and intermediate players who prioritize agility, control, and quick reflexes**. Its lightweight design and head-light balance make it ideal for **defensive play and doubles matches**. However, players seeking a racquet for powerful smashes or those with less-developed technique might benefit from considering a different option.It's important to **remember that individual experiences can vary**, and trying out the racquet yourself before purchase is always recommended.

Name: neeraj Agnihotri
Title: Endless Joy and Playfulness - Toyzone Magic Car Brings Delight to My Child!
Description: I recently purchased the Toyzone Magic Car Swing Car for my child, and I am overjoyed to share that it has brought an immense amount of happiness and excitement into our home. This incredible toy has not only captured my child's imagination but has also proven to be a source of endless fun and playfulness.From the moment we introduced the Toyzone Magic Car to my child, their eyes lit up with wonder. The concept of a car that moves with a simple twist of the steering wheel has sparked their imagination and creativity. It's heartwarming to see how much joy this toy has brought to their playtime.The design and construction of the Magic Car are remarkable. The sturdy build ensures safety during play, while the smooth wheels and easy maneuverability add to the overall enjoyment. I appreciate the attention to detail in the design, as it replicates the feel of a real car, making it even more appealing to young minds.One of the standout features of this toy is its ability to engage my child's gross motor skills and coordination. The act of swaying the steering wheel to propel the car forward not only entertains but also aids in the development of important physical skills. It's wonderful to see how seamlessly play and learning are intertwined with this toy.As a parent, I value toys that provide entertainment while also offering some educational value. The Toyzone Magic Car achieves this balance beautifully. It encourages imaginative play, helps improve balance and coordination, and fosters a sense of independence as my child enjoys exploring their surroundings on their own.Furthermore, the Magic Car's durability has pleasantly surprised me. Even with hours of play, it has shown no signs of wear and tear. This reassures me that this toy will continue to be a cherished companion in my child's playtime adventures for a long time.

When my kids received the kit, they were thrilled to see the Princess, Mermaid, and Unicorn designs ‚Äì it was like getting a canvas to paint their own magical world on our windows.**Crafting Fun:**They found the kit easy to use with all the necessary tools provided. Watching them engage in creating these beautiful artworks was a delight.**Age Suitability:**For my older child, aged 7, it was a perfect fit. However, for my younger one, at 4 years old, it required more supervision due to the delicate nature of glass painting.**Decorative Delight:**The finished artworks brought a splash of color and charm to our windows, and my kids were ecstatic to see their creations adorning our home.**Limitations:**Although they loved the designs, having a wider variety to choose from would have made it even more exciting for them.**Conclusion:**Overall, the Imagimake Window Art - Princess Glass Painting Set was a hit! It provided a fantastic creative outlet, especially for my older child, and added a touch of magic to our windows. While it might need more supervision for younger kids and a broader design range could enhance the experience, it was an enjoyable and engaging craft activity for them.

As an avid tech enthusiast and watch aficionado, I've had the pleasure of putting this timepiece through its paces, and here's my comprehensive review.Design:The Firebolt Watch boasts a captivating design that seamlessly blends futuristic aesthetics with timeless elegance. Crafted from premium materials, its stainless steel case exudes durability while maintaining a lightweight feel on the wrist. The sleek matte finish and minimalist dial design exude sophistication, making it suitable for both casual and formal occasions. The attention to detail in the construction is evident, from the precision-engineered crown to the finely crafted strap options that ensure a comfortable fit for every wearer.Functionality:What truly sets the Firebolt Watch apart is its impressive array of features and functionalities. At its core, it is a smartwatch that seamlessly integrates with your digital life. The vibrant OLED display delivers crisp visuals, whether you're checking notifications, tracking your fitness goals, or simply glancing at the time. With its intuitive touchscreen interface and responsive controls, navigating through the watch's myriad functions is a breeze.One of the standout features of the Firebolt Watch is its comprehensive health and fitness tracking capabilities. Equipped with advanced sensors, including a heart rate monitor and GPS, it provides real-time insights into your activity levels, sleep patterns, and overall wellness. Whether you're hitting the gym or exploring the great outdoors, this watch serves as your dedicated health companion, empowering you to reach your fitness goals with ease.Performance:Under the hood, the Firebolt Watch is powered by a robust processor that ensures smooth performance and snappy responsiveness. Whether you're multitasking between apps, streaming music, or engaging in a workout session, the watch delivers seamless performance without any lag or slowdowns. With its long-lasting battery life, you can confidently wear it throughout the day and beyond, knowing that it will keep up with your active lifestyle.Connectivity:In today's interconnected world, seamless connectivity is paramount, and the Firebolt Watch delivers on this front. Compatible with both iOS and Android devices, it effortlessly syncs with your smartphone, allowing you to stay connected on the go. Whether you're receiving calls, texts, or app notifications, you'll never miss a beat with this watch by your side. Plus, with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily stream music, control smart home devices, and access a wealth of third-party apps right from your wrist.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Firebolt Watch is a true powerhouse that combines style, functionality, and performance in a single package. Whether you're a tech-savvy individual looking for a versatile smartwatch or a fashion-forward trendsetter seeking a statement accessory, this watch ticks all the boxes. With its sleek design, advanced features, and seamless connectivity, it's not just a timepiece‚Äîit's a companion that empowers you to conquer your day with confidence. So why settle for ordinary when you can ignite your wrist with the Firebolt Watch?

product: ANNI DESIGNER Women's Cotton Blend Straight Embroidered Kurta Set With Dupatta
Name: nilesh s.
Title: Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194: Budget-Friendly Fitness on Your Wrist
Description: Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194: Budget-Friendly Fitness on Your WristThe Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194 is a smartwatch aimed at those looking for a feature-packed wearable at an affordable price. Let's see if it lives up to the hype.Design and Build: * The Phoenix boasts a  1.43-inch AMOLED display with a decent resolution, offering clear visuals. * The metal body feels surprisingly sturdy for the price, and the IP67 water resistance allows you to take it for runs or wear it in the rain. * While some reviewers find the design sporty and functional, others might  consider it a bit bulky.Features: * The standout feature is Bluetooth calling, which lets you make and receive calls directly from your wrist. This is a convenience you won't find in many smartwatches at this price point. * Beyond calls, it offers a suite of health and fitness trackers, including heart rate monitoring, SpO2 (blood oxygen) measurement, and multiple sports modes. * Sleep monitoring and stress monitoring are included as well, although their accuracy might be debated.Battery Life: * The Fire-Boltt Phoenix is advertised to last up to 5 days on a single charge, which is fairly standard. However, frequent use of features like Bluetooth calling can significantly reduce that.Other Considerations: * The companion app might not be the most intuitive, and some users report occasional syncing issues. * While the watch offers a wide variety of watch faces, their quality can be inconsistent.Overall:The Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194 is a solid option for budget-minded fitness enthusiasts who prioritize features like Bluetooth calling. The display is good, the build quality is decent, and the health tracking features, while not perfect, are a welcome addition. However, keep in mind the potential drawbacks like a less-than-perfect app and average battery life when making your decision.Here's a quick breakdown:Pros: * Affordable price * Bluetooth calling * Multiple health and fitness tracking features * AMOLED displayCons: * Bulky design (subjective) * App could be improved * Inconsistent battery life with heavy useIf you're looking for a feature-rich smartwatch at a great price, the Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194 is a strong contender. Just be sure to manage your expectations for app performance and battery life.

Description: Title: Fireboltt Phoenix Smart Watch Review: A Budget-Friendly Fitness CompanionThe Fireboltt Phoenix smartwatch offers a budget-friendly option for those seeking basic fitness tracking and smart features without breaking the bank. Here's a comprehensive review:Design:The Fireboltt Phoenix sports a sleek and minimalistic design, with a lightweight build that makes it comfortable for all-day wear. The 1.4-inch touchscreen display is vibrant and easy to navigate, though it could be slightly larger for improved readability.Features:This smartwatch packs an impressive array of features considering its price point. It offers all-day activity tracking, including steps, distance, calories burned, and sleep monitoring. Additionally, it includes built-in sports modes for various activities like running, cycling, and more, providing users with valuable workout insights.The Fireboltt Phoenix also boasts basic smartwatch functionalities such as notifications for calls, messages, and social media alerts, allowing users to stay connected on the go. However, the device lacks advanced features like NFC for contactless payments or built-in GPS for precise tracking during outdoor activities.Performance:In terms of performance, the Fireboltt Phoenix delivers reliable results for basic fitness tracking. Step counts and sleep tracking are generally accurate, though users may experience occasional discrepancies. The battery life is respectable, offering around 5-7 days on a single charge with moderate usage.Compatibility:The Fireboltt Phoenix is compatible with both Android and iOS devices, ensuring broad accessibility for users across different platforms. However, the companion app could use some refinement in terms of user interface and functionality.Overall:For its affordable price, the Fireboltt Phoenix smartwatch offers excellent value for users seeking a reliable fitness companion with essential smart features. While it may not rival high-end smartwatches in terms of advanced functionalities, it more than meets the needs of casual users and fitness enthusiasts on a budget. If you're looking for an affordable entry into the world of smartwatches, the Fireboltt Phoenix is definitely worth considering.

Name: Maaz Affan
Title: Average Smartwatch
Description: The Noise Pulse Go Buzz Smart Watch presents itself as a feature-packed wearable device with a range of functionalities aimed at fitness enthusiasts and tech-savvy individuals. Here's a balanced assessment based on its key features:Design and Build QualityThe smartwatch boasts a sleek and modern design, with the Jet Black color adding a touch of sophistication. However, the build quality feels average, with a predominantly plastic construction that may not inspire confidence in terms of durability over the long term.Display and InterfaceFeaturing a 1.69" TFT display, the smartwatch offers a decent viewing experience for displaying notifications, fitness data, and other information. The interface is relatively intuitive, allowing for easy navigation through menus and functions, although it could benefit from some refinements for smoother operation.Features and FunctionalityThe standout features of the Noise Pulse Go Buzz Smart Watch include advanced Bluetooth calling, SpO2 monitoring, and an extensive array of sports modes with auto-detection. While these features sound impressive on paper, their real-world performance may vary. Bluetooth calling functionality may be convenient, but the call quality and connectivity might not always meet expectations. SpO2 monitoring provides a basic indication of blood oxygen levels, although its accuracy may not rival dedicated medical devices. The auto-detection of sports modes is a handy feature for tracking workouts, but its reliability could be inconsistent.Battery LifeThe smartwatch promises up to 7 days of battery life under normal usage conditions, which is respectable for a device of this caliber. However, heavy calling can significantly reduce this battery life, with only around 2 days of endurance under such usage scenarios. While this may suffice for some users, others may find the need for frequent charging inconvenient.Value for MoneyIn terms of value for money, the Noise Pulse Go Buzz Smart Watch offers a decent package of features at a relatively affordable price point. It provides a range of functionalities typically found in higher-end smartwatches, making it an attractive option for those on a budget or looking for a more accessible entry into the smartwatch market.Overall ImpressionsOverall, the Noise Pulse Go Buzz Smart Watch presents a mixed bag of features and performance. While it offers a variety of functionalities at an affordable price, its average build quality, inconsistent performance of certain features, and limited battery life under heavy calling may leave some users wanting more. Nevertheless, for casual users looking for basic smartwatch capabilities with added health and fitness tracking, it could serve as a viable option.

product: ALYNE Lycra Saree Shapewear Petticoat for Women, Women's Blended Saree Shapewear
Name: Vaidya
Title: Good for the price. A few important negatives...
Description: Watch is good enough for the price. But, after using it and observing certain realities for a day -1.) De-husked 4 coconuts manually using machete. On an average, it showed around 70 steps per coconut. Leading to an increase of 280 steps. Dehusking is a sitting/standing process. No walking involved.2.) Did around 2 hours if moving baby jellystones from one place to spread it over another area. Around 100 cubic feet of stones averagely. Maybe more, not less. Watch showed around 70 cal when I started work. After the work it showed 229 cal. Does it mean such heavy work consumes only around 150 cal? Strange. I thought it's much more than working out at the gym. For 2 hours. Involves loading jellystones with shovel, carrying, spreading it on another area covering around 350 sqft using shovel. This can be very misleading during gym visits and exercising, because it might lead to excessive workouts due to very low calorie burnt calculations. Can be dangerous for gym crazy people.3.) Battery can never ever stay 10 days. Manual inside the box says 7 days. Can never run 7 days also. Maximum it might give 2.5 days to 3 days of running. Do not expect more, practically. Maybe 4 days if you have less of calls and messages. WhatsApp, LinkedIn, FB and other notifications will drain the battery faster. Take care to choose notifications for apps that are really needed, to save battery.4.) After all the heavy duty work, it just shows 2 minutes of exercise üòÇ. Maybe this watch is not for a rural resident who has to do manual odd jobs too. Exercise, calories, and stress calculations do not work for real, physical hard work. Totally wrong calculations.5.) Heart rate, SpO2 are good. Also good for call notifications, messages and other social media notifications.6.) Request fitness enthusiasts to really cross verify calorie burnt calculations with other professionals before believing this watch statistics.Overall, no complaints really. Worth the price and the smartwatch has to be used responsibly and with awareness.

Name: vamsi krishna
Title: My 1 month usage Review. Value for Money & Stylish
Description: i have purchased this watch on 05May2023. i have chosen particularly Deep Wine colour as of my choice. Watch came exactly the same as shown from the site with the charger & Warranty . It is awesome good in looks & stylish with amoled display, Bigger Screen & Bluetooth calling function.Pros:1. looks very great & rich to the wrist, especially deep wine colour is fantastic built quality is good.2. Bright display amoled, Bluetooth calling function is super, speaker voice is ok ok.,Mic is great on talking3. Water & sweat resistant, always on display is ok, call alert,my alarm,quick reply,stock,world clock,find my device,sport mode selections, my alarm, health monitorization & Calculator are exellent.4. Fast charging is great, Band strips are rubber quality & ok ok.6. Hart rate,spo2,stress monitor, sensors are excellent & accurate.5. Vibration is good in 3 modes & ringtone is a bit heavy in hearing.6. For 100% battery it is taking 55mins for full charge.Cons:1. when you shake your hand with out walking it is counting the steps. disappointed & it is not accurate.2. Some times wrist awake & tap to wakeup is a bit slow in response.3. If you switch OFF your apps notifications & Bluetooth calling feature in your watch you will get 12 days of battery backup. if you keep ON all the notifications & calling features it will only stood for 3 days.4. Always on display is killing the battery so u can switch it off, weather is not showing accurate.Over all it is a good watch but if you are looking for a exact step counts choose only apple watch for perfect step count. rest of all are good in this watch you can buy happily & don't forget to wear a screen guard to the display to avoid the scratches. this is my over all 1 month usage review.

Name: Joyesh Moirangthem
Title: Value for money
Description: I am writing this after 8 days of usage, I bought it for Rs 3800 on republic day sale and I wouldn't say  it is the best budget smart watch in the market as there are cheaper options too but it is worth the price with the features it is offering, but still there is a lot of space for improvement.Pros1.It is very light so you won't notice its weight most of the time.2. Amoled display, it is a very good feature to be included at this price range.3. Bluetooth calling sound  is above average I would say , it will be hard to use in a loud crowded place though.4. Premium metal finish.5. Very good battery back up I have been using it without charging for the past 8 days and right now the battery is at 31% so average 10% per day consumption (company claims 7 days which is accurate) but it will vary to the extent of your usage. I used it at low(1) brightness indoors with minimalist watch face and 3 level brightness outdoors with Bluetooth calling enabled and wrist awake feature on and heart monitoring every 5 minutes feature is also on. Always on and tap to start  feature is off.6. Health monitoring is also quite accurate.7. Always on, palm feature , tap to on, wrist awake are all present which is great actually.8. Decent Android app(Noisefit) for customisation and monitoring.Cons.1. UI is slow doesn't look like 60hz but 20hz.scrolling is laggy. Hope it improves with update.2. Touch to start is also laggy.3. Wrist awake is also not the smoothest but works 90% of the time but laggy.4. Music can't be played although it has a widget for music.(for pause/play and next only).5. Laggy implementation or synchronisation of command such as don't disturb and silent.AnywayOverall verdict is that  for this price range it is indeed value for money.Expectations lead to disappointments so if you expect features of high end accuracy of high end smart watches you will be disappointed. It is just an upgraded fitness watch with  amoled display and Bluetooth calling feature.Hope this helps.Update : Bluetooth reconnection fail and repairing is next to impossible. Only way is reset. This is the second time I am facing this issue.

product: Jockey 2714 Men's Super Combed Cotton Rich Solid Round Neck Half Sleeve T-Shirt
Name: Vineet
Title: Nice watch but some cons
Description: Today only i recieved this watch at first instance it win my heart ....I was using it a whole day and i found some pros and cons of this watchPros# Amoled Display is very bright and nice# Look and design is premium# Bluetooth calling is awesome, speaker is loud and clear . Even my voice is reaching to opposite party very clearly while calling with watch.# calculator features is useful# Multi Functional crown button is easy and useful .. Easily to change theme with just scroll the crown button# play music directly from the watch with the internal storage although its only 128 mb but sufficient to store around 10 songs approx.. song sound quality is also fine# strap quality is good and soft# TWS connecting features is also niceCons# sometimes i found watch is disconnected with my phone  ..not sure why its happened as i have checked only for one day# fingerprints are clearly visible on  Screen Glass .. i have attached the pic for it#Health Tracker are near to accurate but never rely on smartwatch at this price range.i have measure the bp with this watch and with bp machine both results are different... 70-80% accurate only..# AI Voice assistant is not very useful as it only work for mobile when i press the voice assistant button on watch .. like if i give command to set alarm on watch it set alarm on mobile so basically it just a button to wake up google assistant for mobile phone.#Sometimes when you pick call from your mobile phone call automatically transfer to watch and voice started coming from the watch speaker.. which is quite irritating..this must be correct by firmware updates i have purchased it for Rs.3420/- including bank offer . For this price range overall its a good & premium watch ..Its my experience with this watch for just a one dayRest how it work for long run that depends..

product: Lymio Men T-Shirt || Regular Fit T-Shirt for Men || Plain T Shirt || T-Shirt (Polo-06-10)
Name: akhil a.
Title: Boat Smartwatch with BT calling
Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                



Pros:Impressive Display: The 1.83" HD display is crystal clear, making it easy to read notifications, messages, and fitness data even in bright sunlight.Advanced BT Calling: The BT calling feature is a game-changer. It's so convenient to take calls directly from my wrist without having to reach for my phone.Customizable Watch Faces: The DIY Watch Face Studio is a creative touch. I love being able to personalize my watch face to match my style and mood.Wide Range of Activities: With over 700+ active modes, this watch caters to a wide range of fitness enthusiasts. Whether you're into running, cycling, or yoga, there's a mode for you.Live Cricket Scores: As a cricket fan, having live cricket scores on my wrist is a real bonus. It's been a delight to keep track of my favorite teams without needing to check my phone constantly.Health Monitoring: The HR and SPO2 monitoring features are accurate and helpful for keeping tabs on my overall well-being. Sleep monitoring has also been insightful in improving my sleep patterns.Stylish Design: The Silver Metal variant looks sleek and elegant. It's suitable for both casual and formal occasions.Cons:Honestly, I'm struggling to find any significant drawbacks with this smartwatch. The battery life could be slightly longer, but it still lasts a full day with moderate usage.Recommendation:I highly recommend the boAt Wave Call 2 Smart Watch to anyone in search of a versatile and stylish smartwatch. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, a tech lover, or just someone who wants to stay connected on the go, this watch has you covered.Additional Notes:The watch also comes with a user-friendly mobile app that enhances the overall experience by providing detailed insights into your fitness data and health metrics. The build quality is sturdy, and the touch responsiveness is excellent. Overall, it's a fantastic smartwatch that offers great value for the price.In conclusion, the boAt Wave Call 2 Smart Watch has exceeded my expectations and has become an indispensable part of my daily routine. It's a feature-rich and stylish device that's worth every penny.

Name: AV
Title: Not Polished Enough. (Improving with updates)
Description: [Update: Sept 29] boAt seems to have heard the feedback üòÄ and updated the watch faces. Now there are a few good ones to pick but a slight improvement over the ones the watch earlier had. Bit Impressed. Added one star for it.Not a very polished product. The fonts are tacky and look ugly in the watch for notification text and caller name text. The watch faces are a lazy design job. No point having 150 watch faces if only 10-20 are good or usable. Rest are useless.[UPDATE: Oct 11] boAt seems to be on a smartwatch launch spree. And thanks to that, they are constantly updating the phone app and the watch faces. Now you have many good looking watch faces to choose from. So overall, still the Smartwatch UI needs work. But atleast you have good watch faces.Good:- Screen quality- Battery life- Looks and the metallic frame- Call clarity- BT calling at the price- Reasonably accurate sensorsBad:- The UI, fonts - they are all very ugly and tacky. They could have tried to give the Chinese software some makeover. But it is a clearly lazy job by the tech team. A copy paste job to be precise of getting an outsourced software and plastering it with brand logos.- Restarts randomly when the call is going on on the watch even for 1 min or so.- Watch faces. Again a job of the design / tech / UI team. BoAt doesn't have a good team of designers and UI guys to really offer simple yet good software features like good watch faces and good watch UI.- No option to silence a call or reply with quick replies.Look for Noise Smart Watches in the Same Range. Noise Colorfit Pulse Go Buzz is cheaper and better alternative + has better watch faces and UI and quick reply to notifications and call silence and mute options for lower prices which this watch has clearly missed.You can go for boAt Wave Call also - It isn't an outright bad watch, but there are better options available for the price.boAt - If you have a team who reads and wants to improve, get some good UI and design folks in your team. Your products are good, but the UI and design is what the people see and that's what makes them feel good about your products. You have really average UI.

product: Lymio Men T-Shirt || Regular Fit T-Shirt for Men || Plain T Shirt || T-Shirt (Polo-06-10)
Name: Geethanjali Raghunathan
Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                



The product is super lightweight and easy to wear. No need of buckling.Looks: Aesthetic but it would be better if there are more strap colours. We can increase and decrease the screen brightness. The body looks a little big for women, but would definitely suit men more.Features: O2 levels, Heart rate monitor, Sleep tracking, Fitness (running, jogging, walking and so on).I got this watch for sleep tracking, and it works pretty good. It still doesn't have the sharp and accurate results that you see in Oura rings, but this is good.We can create our own watch faces and it is super fun. From changing the font to selecting the feature slot, it is amazing!You can also customise the app notification that you would want to see on the watch.Here are certain points to note:1. The charge runs out super quick. Without any usage, the battery drops from 100 to 92 in 3 hours. Not sure if this is normal.2. The synchronisation doesn't work all the time. I had my watch on 100% battery but the boat app shows and notifies me that it only has 13%.Also as seen in the video, I was able to view my sleep tracking on the phone but not on the watch. Previously the watch showed the last night's results.3. Sometimes the wrist action doesn't work. The screen stays quiet and doesn't turn on when I flip my wrist.4. The sedentary feature doesn't work properly. You'd be moving and you'd get a notification to move around. I felt that's a bit redundant. The number steps taken (and how recently those steps have been taken) could be synced with the sedentary feature.

The built-in fitness tracking features are incredibly accurate, monitoring my heart rate, steps, and workouts with precision. Plus, the sleep tracking functionality helps me understand and improve my sleep patterns for better overall health.
